Home Twinoid The Twinoid Coffee Shop stories[RP] Infected Beach
On october 28, 2012
[5165401]

First of all, I'm sorry for stealing this idea but I created a new and more rational RP because the other one is dying out.


It starts in a small tent, on a small beach. The tent has a big transparent plastic sheet laid as the flooring. Inside the tent contains 4 plastic bags, 2 packets of edible chips and a 1.5 litre bottle filled to the brim with clean water. The tent can fit 2-3 people.
The beach has alot of trash, and some useful loots. One side of the beach is the sea, containing countless amount of unpurified water, and on the other side, is a forest filled with lots and lots of trees.


Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.
On october 28, 2012
[5165401]

Woodypeeks outside and make sure there are no zombies. He then starts to cut trees with his axe, making alot of noise. After finishing his first tree, he slowly lugs the wood back to his tent. He faces back at the trees only to see a group of 7 zombies staring at him "Brains...".SAVE ME!!
On october 29, 2012
Griffonn

Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

opening his eyes, the man winced in pain as salt flushed his eyes. He was in salt water? Looking around, though the sun limited his sight in distance, he knew he was in the ocean. He looked at his raft, which appeared to be some old chest.

moving a bit on his flotation devise, the man noticed his white gloved hand was grasped tightly onto some formal walking stick. Then it all came back.

The yacht.
The party.
His occupation as a butler.
The news on the radio.
The storm...

As the man closed his eyes, absorbing the recovered information, a sudden jolt knocked him into the water. Prepared to thrash about for air, his back hit a soft surface.
Sand.

His vision growing, he began realizing his situation. He had struck an island. Though, this peaceful state of zen was cut short, due to a disturbing scene. Between a dense jungle, and the man, was a small tent which looked nearly empty, along with a man surrounded by 7 of the undead monsters. Knowing that his formal walking stick could not take out nearly enough to help the other survivor, he looked at his "Raft" chest. Whatever was in it, could possibly be used to kill the horde of cannibalistic fiends. Now he just needed help getting the chest open...
On october 29, 2012
alwaysmetara

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.
Robin peeks her head out from the jungle and watches as a man is trapped by a group of zombies. He calls for help.
She sneaks over to a better attacking position and waits. Suddenly, she sees a man washed up on the shore.
He has a large chest with him and was frantically trying to open it. She decides to wait to see what happens next.
On october 29, 2012
[5169502]

Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.
AlexAlex was prodding his bloody baton at a poor zombie in the jungle until it died. He looked around until a beach caught his attention. 5-7 zombies.. surrounding something.. something?
Alex took out a hand grenade and launched it towards the horde. It explodes, and Alex moves closer to the beach. Behind a few trees, Alex sees 8 corpse and a tent. Whats that? Behind them.. is that a zombie.. and a box?
Alex takes out his second hand grenade, when a soft hand pats him on the shoulder. He turns over and sees a small girl in a blue dress.
On october 29, 2012
alwaysmetara

Bea Bea shakes her head at the man that threw the hand grenade. She points once to the man next to the chest as he stands up, leaning on the stick. He waves in what obviously is a human gesture. She looks back at the man with the grenades, as if to say, "See?"
The man next to the tent calls for help again. She faces his direction and walks toward him purposefully.

On october 29, 2012
[5169502]

AlexAlex realised that it was a human, and the 3 settled down at the tent. "My name is Alex."
Bea"I'm Bea."
Griffonn"Mine's Griffonn, can you open this chest?" AlexAlex then prods the chest with the stun baton repeatedly, until a click was heard and the chest locks loosened.
On october 29, 2012
Griffonn

Noticing that the militarized man had cleverly opened the chest, Griffonn became sullenly disappointed at the lack of skills he had attained during his time as a butler.
..Not important now.

Silently, he crept over the chest and peered into the water-damaged interior. Floating in the clouded water were components to what looked like... a lawn mower?

On october 29, 2012
[990755]

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Richard Keller"Where am i...hello, is anyone here?"
He quickly turns his head and notices a tent
Richard KellerA tent...survivors! Heeey! Hello!
On october 29, 2012
065tdsa

Name: 65 (real name: unknown)
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).

6565 was hiding in a tree in the forest, looking around for potential dangers and things of interest, when he heard a loud explosion coming from the shore.

He quickly moved there, to see a bunch of people around a few dead zombies. One of them, he looked like a policeman, was still holding a grenade, which was probably the cause of the explosion.

"Hey kid" he said to the young policeman. "You know, i like to see a bunch of zombies eating a nade probably even more than the average guy!" and he laughed.

"But i heard the blast," he continued, "and if i heard it, you can bet that some more of those buggers heard it too. So how about we keep the explosive fun on the low side just for a while, eh?"

As he stopped to observe this weird bunch of survivors, he thought: This going to be one heck of a tour... Although it might get a bit sad when the kid runs straight into a horde with his police baton and we never see him again.

Gender : Male

Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.
AlexAlex and Bea turned over and pondered for awhile, "Makes sense..", while Griffonn was busy with his lawn mower. AlexSuddenly, we heard groaning. A horde of (21) zombies has appeared in the forest and is now charging towards the 5

alwaysmetara

Bea Bea looks off into the distance. A horde of zombies were approaching. She walks over to her cat and whispers, "Sparrow, can you do this?" She pets the cat on its head. Then they both look at the horde of rapidly approaching zombies.

[5169502]

Alex"I got an idea! We can fill the plastic bags with water!!" Alex hurries and fill all 4 plastic bags with water from the sea, he also finishes 1 packet of chips and fills it with water. The horde of zombies arrives, Alex and Bea finishes the zombies without sound. Alex says, "Its night now, what should we do?"
On october 30, 2012
Griffonn

Griffonn takes a pipe and sealed canister of matches out from his nearly dried pants pocket.

"Shall we start a fire?"
On october 30, 2012
065tdsa

6565 stares at the dead zombies, then at the young policeman, whom he would have officially kicked out of boot camp by now, if they actually were back at bootcamp...

"Amazing... Anyone likes sea water? Or zombie blood, if you wish for a more interesting agony... Or we can just use this machete, since i see there are no more zombies around..." he says as he takes his machete.

He then turns towards the man preparing to start a fire, and says "Sure thing, nothing like a good fire to spend the night. I will be taking the night guard though. No more funny stuff."

"Tomorrow we will have to go find water, especially since i am almost running on stale urine right now, so everyone go get some rest", he concluded, and sat right next to the soon-to-be campfire.
On october 30, 2012
Griffonn

Stale Urine?... Oh boy, these guys are hardcore.

A butler up against militarized survivors? I better be careful.

Griffonn tightens his surprisingly unblemished white gloves, and begins collecting bits of driftwood and dried leaves within the blood strewn sand.

After a small pile was constructed, Griffonn lit the neatly carved pipe. Pushing the pipe gently into a small compact pile of leaves and twigs, a small puff of smoke generated while the light smell of tobacco and burning leaves diffused into the air around the group.

Griffonn glanced at the lit pipe in his hand, and took a small puff. He turned away quickly and coughed. Nope, he still hated it.

"Oh boy, this is going to be one hell of a tour alright! Now, you better go rest and recover, because you look as a survivor from the titanic or something."
On october 30, 2012
Griffonn

Chuckling, Griffonn gave a smile, a slight nod, and extended an arm.

"You look like a man who has seen some battles with more than just the walking dead." Griffonn assumed, noticing the ragged uniform.

Glancing at the number 65, Griffonn became curious as to what its significance was, but dared not to ask.

"My name's Griffonn, it is a pleasure to make you acquaintance."

Griffonn settled into a spot in the sand by the fire, as it was a very relaxing change from clinging onto a half afloat chest.

"On the other hand, i see that not so long ago, you were defeated and assimilated by that horrible conglomerate only known as a suit" he laughed.

"So welcome back to the ground, in more than one way. You are quite nice for some half-eagle half-lion thing. You can call me 65, and take this as a piece of advice from my nicest self: do NOT ask."

Theminitroopers(Again,can i join?)

I would say to come right in, i dont know for sure.

65As 65 was looking around, and preparing for what would be a boring night guard, he noticed something in one of the piles of dead zombies. "Hm, wait, is that a human between those things?"

It was. A man with an axe, whom was apparently carrying some wood at the time he was attacked.

"Hm, is this guy even alive?" he said to himself, as he dragged him by the fire. He must be the owner of the tent, he thought. No doubt prepared, no doubt worthy to be added to this new ragtag unit of his.

"Only one way to find out..." he said again to himself, and, as he laughed, he grabbed his machete. He then softly poked the man with his machete.

On october 31, 2012
Griffonn

Hit the "Roleplay" Option using the toolbar at the top of your typing area for the thread message. If you still cannot find it then do [*rp*] before your Roleplay Text and [*/rp*] after. What is in between will be in that bubble thing thet we have. But keep in mind use those symbols without the stars in them!

Hope I helped.

On november 1, 2012
065tdsa

65"Oh well, looks like i am having fun. Wake up, everyone! Get on formation around the tent. We have 20 incoming hostiles, move!"

He then turned towards the man, who was apparently some Swat guy with a Desert Eagle and told him "Put out the fire, wake the guys up and get that look out of your face" as he noticed the man was fairly annoyed at him.

He grabbed a piece of burning wood from the fire and ran out towards the sea shouting "Come to get your dinner, you stinking corpses!", as he held up and moved both his machete and the piece of burning wood.

He continued moving towards the sea until the lower half of his body was underwater, and then he stood there.

The zombies followed him towards the water slowly but constantly, as he continued screaming "Come and get me, brainless morons!"

065tdsa

65"I think you already killed 4 of them, and you might get some more in my opinion" 65 responded to the SWAT man's comment.

As he observed the zombies some more 65 had an idea. He threw the torch at one of them, killing it and then he moved his blade through the water, and used the wet blade to slash 4 zombies like a hot knife cutting through butter.

"Feel like a samurai" he said, as he retreated to the water one more time. This time the zombies started attacking quickly. As the area of the shore filled with bodies the water was getting filthy, and they wouldnt burn anymore.

Oh, oh he thought, but then he looked into the sea and prepared to hold tightly his ground Hm, a wave's coming, a good one... he thought, as he moved his machete aroujnd to keep them away.

On november 1, 2012
alwaysmetara

Bea Bea heard the sounds of battle, but it sounded far away. Must be just a nightmare, she thought sleepily, and tried to ignore it.
However, when a small paw poked into her left cheek, Bea woke up.
She blinked a few times and realized that there was actually a battle going on outside.
She ran out the tent and saw a group of zombies standing in the shallow water. There were bodies everywhere.
Quite nice of them not to wake me up, she thought, and took out the grapefruit.
She prepared to throw the grapefruit, but Alex suddenly darted pass and killed the rest of the zombies.
She slowly put the grapefruit back in her bag, feeling annoyed. 65 standing there, looking rather amused.
She crossed her arms. "Next time something like that happens, I would appreciate if you wake me, please," she said quietly, but with steel in her voice.

065tdsa

65Now talking about temporary awesomeness... 65 thought as he saw the policeman fall to the ground. He started getting out of the water only to get completely hit by a 5 foot tall wave. That should have been for them... he thought as he looked at the zombies that the policeman had killed.

As he got to the shore he saw the SWAT guy had fainted as well. What's with police officers and fainting this days! he thought as he went to check on the policeman.

As he found out that he wasn't breathing, he called out "Is anyone here a doctor? This kid is not breathing!" He then turned towards the girl who standed there, with her weird cat beside her, and told her "i will drag this guy back and do CPR or something. You go drag the other one". "And if you really feel like carriying that around," he continued, refering to the gun the girl was holding, "check him for some 9mm rounds, because otherwise that thing is just dead weight".

On november 1, 2012
Griffonn

Waking up next to a smouldering fire, Griffonn heard shuffling of feet, and looking over his shoulder, realized the policeman being dragged off by the number man, along with the SWAT guy being dragged off by the girl who called herself Bea.

Huh?

"What did I sleep through?" Griffonn mumbled to himself, peering around at all the dead corpses lying in the stained sand.

He recalled someone saying something about first aid?
"That explains te unconcious bodies...

Getting up quickly, he jogged towards the men being dragged away. "I know first aid. I can help."

On november 1, 2012
065tdsa

65As he noticed that Griffonn was awake, he pointed at the policeman, and said "This guy stopped breathing, so that's a good thing."
As he said that, he thought Maybe, just maybe, I should have learned something other than to record time of death from the squad's doc...

He then went down to where the SWAT guy was, and helped to drag him over to the camp. He was weak, but at least was awake. 65 told the girl"Watch him, give him some of that water, and try to find out if he is dieing within the next 5 minutes while your are at it, would you?".

Then he went over to get the lawnmower, in case there were more zombies on the way.
On november 1, 2012
Griffonn

Griffonn began CPR. He first checked for breathing. No vitals. After making sure there was no excessive bleeding, Griffonn gave 2 breaths, and 30 chest compressions after that. He repeated this over and over... While doing so, a vivid memory traced back to him, something he had not remembered before.

He saw fire, rain, and the mast of a ship cracking and snapping up nails and splintering shards of wood. Screaming came from within a cabin on the ship. He just stood there, doing the CPR to not only his employer, but someone who over the years had become a good friend. It looks like even on a ship, they could not escape the dying world. All he remembered was one of the chefs having a bandage, and after seemingly having died of natural causes, came back.

The rest of the memory is a blur, all he recalls after that was black smoke choking him and stinging his throat, while his eyes watered in an attempt to stop the pain that simulated thousands of needles pricking into his cornea. He then felt a coolness submerge him under a great pressure, he grabbed a metallic and wooden object, and hung on for dear life before everything went black.

Shaking his head, Griffonn came back to reality. He had continued CPR, and though he was growing tired, continued on. He would not let this man die.
On november 1, 2012

6565 woke up to find out he fell asleep right on the lawnmower. His first thought was I am getting old...

He then looked around, and as he saw a couple of strangers that were not part of the usual bunch, one of them with a dog, and he thought Hm, maybe they will cover the next night watch, not to mention dogs are actually friendly, unlike some other animals...

"Well, well, we have guests. But first, did our 5 second hero live? He was a bit unsane, but then again i actually like that..."

065tdsa
65

"Shame... I mean, after all of the stupid stuff he did he should have had a better death than a heart attack, or whatever that was.

"I think i never got to ask him his name," he continued."Guess it is the habit, i would usually know before hand..."

65 then observed then man who had spoken. Sneaky type, with a sword and a cool name to boot. This kind of guys can be real pieces of work...

The other one was rather a kid, and apparently a wanna-be policeman. Lets just hope he didn't get to go through fainting 101, he thought.

"You can both call me 65. Now, for today we need to do a few things, to find a water source, build a better shelter, and to clear the corpses from the camp. It is starting to stink."

"I think i can handle the shelter, since there is an axe here, and i already have my machete," he continued.

"I will need someone to cover me from here though, i dont want to get killed the same way as the axe's previous owner did."

On november 3, 2012
Griffonn

Griffonn took up the task of searching the beaches for anything worth looting, that could come in use for survival. He was ankle deep in water when a black mass suddenly snaked between his ankles, tripping him into the murky beach water.

He had just gotten his tie dried and nicely tied...

He squirmed out of the water, and looked at the item which had posed a burden. He was surprised when we found a coat, and not just any coat, but his suit coat!

Trying to be discrete as to not come across as a simpleton unprepared and unfit for such a grave morbid world, Griffonn stuck his formal walking stick (A surprisingly formidable weapon) into the sand and crudely hung his suit jacket there to dry.

Strolling further down the beach, he continued to pick through the sand, looking for items of any value to their survival.

On november 3, 2012
[5169502]

Let's update the board!

Mission : Find a water source, Find some food, Build a shack, Clear the corpses from the camp."

Name: Griffonn - Clear corpses
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: High speech skills.

Name: Bea - Find food
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Weapons: a water pistol and an exploding grapefruit
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.

Name: Richard Keller - Guard
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 - Build a shack
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).

Name : Chris - Guard
Gender : Male
Age : 20
Weapons : Desert eagle with 6 bullets
Perks : Great at hand to hand combat and has knowledge on first aid.

Name: Hunter - Find water
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Weapon: A sword he stole from a museum after the zombies started appearing.
Perks: Stealth, if you've got something you want done without much noise or unconcealed motion he's your man.

Name : Keith - Find food
Gender : Male
Age : 14
Weapons : A baton
Items : 2 cans of dog food
Perks : Good at close combat, has a tamed police dog

Name : Ruff - Find (dog) food
Gender : Male
Eats : Meat, Bones, Dog food
Perks : Able to understand his owner, Keith.
Moves : ((Basic moves such as eat not mentioned))
Leaping - Ruff leaps at a target's face. [LEAP]
Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

FAIR? Lets roleplay our parts..!

He goes back to camp to report it to 65.

On november 3, 2012
065tdsa
65

65 was in the forest by the camp, with the axe ready to cut some trees down. He was still in the sight of the guys back at the camp, since there was no need to be stupid.

He cutted down some trees. He then started dragging two of them back. Luckily the area seemed to be devoid of zombies.

Back at the camp, he carved them into what would be the start of a nice palisade, with his machete.

As he explained the process to the guys in the camp, he left Chris with the machete so that he could continue carving the trees as he brought them.

After a few trips to the forest, a nice wall was starting to take shape.

alwaysmetara

[rp=Bea] "It's been a great day, everyone! But I'm wondering... If we can find a way to purify that seawater we'll have enough water to last us a long while... " Bea takes a bottle of water and carefully takes two sips. Then she pours a bit into her palm and lets her cat, Sparrow, drink from it.
Suddenly, Sparrow's ears perk up and her tail starts lashing back and forth. Next to them, Ruff sits up and barks twice.
Bea looks off into the distance, and says distractedly, "Horde of zombies to the east..." She touches her gun, a habit she started after Alex died.

On november 4, 2012
065tdsa

6565 looks at the horde that's coming towars the walls "It seems it is time for kickass mode..." he says to himself.

He prepares with his machete, and then remembers the axe, and picks that up as well. "Time for some good, old fashion DUAL WIELD!" he screams as he goes over the palisade and heads for the shore side.

He then begins to scream to the others "Ok, i will have this side, you spread around and make sure we don't get flanked through the woods."

He then continued, "If things go real FUBAR the shore is our best escape route, so you better give me some cover fire every now and then, are we clear?"

He then looked closely at the horde. A 100 or so rotting corpses walking towards the palisade they had only put together a few hors ago.

No biggie, as long as everyone keep their stuff together, that is... he thought as he waited for the engagement.

BeaBea stands on top of the wall, easily picking off the zombies that have managed to get that far. "Oh, I'm running out of water," she whispers, and walks around to refill it. However, the masses of zombies were starting to crowd around the wall, and it creaked ominously. Bea looked over with alarm. "Sparrow, help me please!" she yelled.
SparrowSparrow jumps over the wall and starts clawing and biting the zombies, confusing them enough for Bea to refill her gun.
Bea"Thanks!" Bea moves back into position and starts firing again.

65

"Well", 65 said, as he looked around the area,"I think that's the last of them, or at least for now. Just gotta make sure."

65 started going around the battlefield, looking for the few that were still crawling around and fiishing them as he found them.

After a while he came back and said "So, how did the day of exploration go for the rest of you guys? If someone tells me they found a place with hot water, i might even kiss them!"

He was covered by a mess of blood and guts that was quite disgusting. "Oh well, i better go for a swim or something, before this stuff starts rotting on me," he said, and took off towards the shore.

His proud stroll, as he dawns his newly found suit jacket and swings his formal walking stick, turns almost to a hunch, as he frowns at the beach drenched with carson puddles and layered with rotting bodies.

On november 12, 2012
Draink

Off: Why not try scavenging like this?

Food = d1-20

Zombies = d21-30

Weapons = d31-50 (depending on type of store)

Clothing = d50-70 (depending on store or building, i.e. gunshop has no clothing, department store should.)

NPC (may be controlled by the RPers) = d71-80 (passive) d81-90 (aggressive, i.e. bandit, raider, griefer, ghoul, lunatic.)

I'll join once Trooper RPs about the "city"

On november 15, 2012
Draink

Name: Draink
Gender: Male
Age: 29
Appearance: Brown skin with a 5 o clock shadow, chipped shorts and oil-greased white T-shirt with dirt splatters.
Weapon: Rusty Chain
Perks: Hearing, observant, with a bucket full of architecture and digging (wells)
(Forgot to add sorry! )

Draink

"Name's Draink, fine to see another breather. This town.. there was a massive death toll a month ago, people left, I stayed. People died, and I surely don't look like those pus bags," Draink points to the several rotters who lay on the with oozing blisters and boils.

"How many people you have? There's a shelter over by the lake, gasoline station. The pumper exploded, popped out the windows like popcorn, the people there, burned alive. Nearly became one of them. There's two other guys at the gas station, I could show you, not a mile away."

He extends a hand after clipping the rusty chain through his trousers where spots show his thigh, burnt black as an indication of the gasoline fire.

On november 15, 2012
BlackVoid

HunterHunter shakes his hand and goes to look out the window. After a brief pause he says, "Oh, great! It seems we're trapped by around seventy or so zombies. While we're here I'll try to explain our situation and we can see if there's a way to escape. There's about six of us back at camp, a SWAT, some type of military official, a cop, a little girl, a butler, and me. So far we're pretty set up, but we'll probably need more provisions and defenses soon. That gas station may have some food and clean drinking water we can use until we decide to move. Now, any ideas on how to get rid of those guys or escape without them noticing?"
On november 15, 2012
[1241341]

Name: Vel
Gender: Male
Age: 19
Appearance: Blond-haired, a somewhat athletic body, brown leather trousers with a ripped blue-shirt underneath.
Weapon: A pitchfork and a screwdriver
Perks: Quite a good farmer and has a formidable strength for his age.

Vel"It's been quite a time staying in this barn." Vel said to himself as he watch some zeds on the top of his barn from afar walking. "Maybe I should go find something to keep up with this boredom." When he saw some zombies rushing towards a cloud of smoke, which was probably a campsite, he just murmured to himself," This is it!". So without delay, he packed his pouch with some vegetable seeds, took 2 canteens of water and 3 slices of meat and rushed off.

As he was halfway, he rested for a while and drank his canteen. He noticed something and the moment he dropped his canteen, a zed was about to maul him! Luckily, he managed to spit half of he drank at zed. While the zed burned in agony, he decided to throw one slice of meat to distract the zombies, in case some zeds would rush towards the screaming and burning zombie.

He was at the outskirts of the campsite but didn't went down yet. "Just to make sure its not another zed spawn, I'll just make a site here on my own." He rested by the rock near the shore and was shocked when he woke up: He was followed by the zombies because of the stench of the meat!!

Draink

"This way, just north of here by a lakebed, don't think about the water, there's dead bodies," Draink expels heavy breaths of air as the sunlight beat down on him. "There's a tree there.. post office.... we're close!"

The two charge faster as 95 zombies gradually shifted behind them, the strong stench of decomposing flesh filled the air along with the constant thick moans of "Truuaugh! Tarrapuh! Gruuunghr!"

6 underlying living dead townspeople closed in the flanks from left and right, east and west, restlessly snapping their cold claws at the air where Draink and Hunter were a handful of seconds ago.

A woman with a torn shirt took foot as the fastest of her breed and tugged on the end of Draink's T-shirt, its lazy, stiff fingers gripping firm. Draink sparked an elbow into its ribs, letting the woman exhale her foul breath straight into his face. "Get the hell off pus bag!" Draink rejected her with a round blazing the corner of her cheek, flaps of rotting meat with larvae attached hanged on. "Disgusting.."

Travis and Brandon are allowed to be used by other RPers who are with them!

Name: Travis
Gender: Male
Age: 32
Appearance: Burly man with sideburns, sports a Van Dyke style beard. He wears a dark green shirt and long, black pants that shake the hands of his sneakers. Black running shoes. African-American
Weapon: Battery Launcher 1-ITF 5x batteries
Perks: Guardsman, ideal protection. Marksman with medium-range weapons.

Name: Brandon
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to early thirties
Appearance: Pale, brown shaggy hair that is overgrown. Multiple burn wounds across neck and chest, bandaged injury on knee. Gray shorts and flannel shirt. No shoes, blanket draped on. Caucasian.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Scavenging, useless now because of injuries from gas station explosions.


Draink
Before Draink can utter any words, a figure escapes the gas station. The gas station is in mild flames but shows signs of the flames that devastated the place many days before. "How's the kid, eh Travis?" Draink swiped the film of sweat forming on his firehead.



Travis"Not doing well, he needs medicine or the burn'll get him sick. I ain't gonna put the guy down when he turns, like Judith and," he recollects himself but with a more depressed tone, "and my pain in the nick lil' bro."

Draink

"That won't happen again," Draink knew there was a long future ahead, so it was vague to him. The epidemic was the result of the world getting their head up their rear and back out. "This is Hunter. Hunter this is Travis, Brandon is inside the shelter. The fire toasted him. Week after week man, trying to keep him alive."

Draink beamed withered eyes that radiated lost hope and exhaustion of all choices. "The camp. Anyone there who can help Brandon?"

AbrahamHears explosion
What the hell was that!? I should probably go there to investigate, I hope the zombies around here won't be of much troub-
A zombie starts to shift form side to side, moaning loudly to alert its' fellow predators
Dammit!
Abraham grabs his crowbar and beats the zombie to death as quickly as possible. Then runs to the roof of the building and hops onto another building adjacent to it.
I need to be more careful, one wrong move and I can end up being swarmed. These zombies are smarter than I anticipated.
Abraham starts walking towards the explosion, deep in thought.

Dear anyone who lives in this makeshift shack,
I took some stuffs in this place (It's your job to find out what it is) and took it to my barn which is much better than this camp. To find my place, I'll be leaving tree marks. The first tree is at 3' o'clock facing away from the waters. If you want to join me, better salvage your camp for resources like wood and metals. Don't worry my barn has lots of rusted tools. Hope you come here, the brainless may get me first. Also, there is a river near my place. It may have been clogged, but once your'e here, we may have a cleaner source of water.

Thanks!!

Random Average Farmer Dude.

So I set off and went home, leaving the tree marks in each tree I manage to pass by. And first thing to do was to plant the seeds for my upcoming visitors, hopefully they are live ones, and clean up my ranch. "Well, let's get started." Hopefully I may finishing cleaning this up by an hour...

Draink retreated in aghast, turning to see familiar people. Hunter and Chris, they themselves attracting parts of the horde, enclosing around him. Then something tugged onto his sleeve.

Draink
Draink
Draink crammed his fist into the figure, his eyes turning to confusion. The rotter stiffened its arms, cropping its brows and perking its ears. Her ears. It was her. He walked backwards, landing on the ground for only to crab walk into the a tree. He thought he was smoked, but soon enough he laid his hands on a wooden staff from the tree. He wrapped his fingers around it and pegged at the woman who moaned in crying distress, her cheeks shredded to pig meat, thighs with claw marks. "Sta-stay back!"

065tdsa

65While they planned, they could not imagine their former comrade would get ahead of them...

"Ooooonnneeee, oooooonnneee..." said the smart one as they jogged around the forest. He wanted them fast. He didn't quite remember what that was, but he felt that running would help them.

He couldn't go beyond "one" though, with both their pace and his own at such a crawl.

As they came to a path within the forest he saw marks on the trees.

He then looked at the floor, and he saw very familiar marks. "Mooooweeerrr... Buuuuuttlleeeer?..." he said, as he tried to remember, but it was to no avail.

"Moooovvvveee... heeeeereee..." he told his "squad" as he headed down the road, following the markers. Remember, he wanted to, although he couldn't figure out how to order the words properly.

Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.

Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.

Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.
Alex

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 (real name: unknown)
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).

Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

On november 22, 2012
Draink
Draink

After the camp mates decide the jobs, go to their stations.

Draink sent his goodbyes to the two other teams and closed the makeshift gates. Sturdy, but the wall needs repairing.

He fished through the storage the contained resources and took 6 tree planks and a handful of rusty nails from the storage along with standard looking claw hammer. "We can add a few patches of wood, make it more sturdy. There's a car crashed into a rock, I'll go strip it of metal, use it for a watchtower." He handed the wood, nails, and hammer to Chris before leaving the camp.

The sun woke from its sleep, beaming light into Draink's eyes, making him wince. He set down the handgun next to the storage then raced into the trees after the car.

He'd seen the automobile bended into a seaside boulder, a corpse inside it, when they fought the devilish undead.

He hoped the herd of rotters had passed by.

065tdsa

65"Iiiiifffyyyy... Noooooonnneeee..." said the smart one as they moved slowly along the road. He didn't know why, but he didn't like to just walk around in the middle of the path.

He took one his companion's heads and placed it on a stump on the side of the road. "Hoooooowwwlll..." he told the head, hoping it would understand his request.

Afterwards the bunch went down the road until reached a fence that marked the limit of a farm. The smart one saw the marks as they went through a gate.

He rised his blade and attacked the gate with all his strength.

On november 23, 2012
065tdsa

65The gate was smashed cleanly by a very powerful blow. "Meeeee stroooong..." said the smart one, marvelled by his ability to cause destruction.

"Whoooo meeeee?..." he then wondered, his happy thoughts degenerating into sadness as he realized he still had little recollection of who he was, what he was.

He then turned to see the others stand mindlessly. They needed him, those brainless beings. He walked in as he ordered them to follow him with a quick gesture.

As they followed, he was left without a doubt. His purpose, his calling, was to lead. That is all i need, he thought.

On november 23, 2012
065tdsa
BlackVoidOff: Can someone give me a guide on how this dice thing works? When am I supposed to role and what exactly is it determining?

Depending on what you do, you roll for success, how successful, and values such as that. Normally from 50 and upwards it is succesful, but the situation can have higher requirements. For example could have left you hunting the air with a good one.
65The smart one found a way in, but the wind brought the smell of a stranger coming towards them. It was a familiar smell in a way. But it was also mixed with the blood of the fallen companion.

He could not find the hideout fast enough, there was no time to escape. He decided to send the group in instead. He knew he would stand a better chance against this stranger than any of them.

He also wanted to kill him. He killed one of his group. He needed a word for this feeling, a clear one to put on his mouth.

"Reeveeengeee!" he found in his mind, and screamed as he stood his ground.

On november 23, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one was pleased as his opponent returned to the forest. His arm still hurted from destroying that gate.

He then went inside after the others, who were starting to get nervous. As he entered, he saw the source of that persistent piece of memory, the lawnmower. Or that's what he thought it was.

He then had a short flashback. He saw that thing running over many like his own mates. He started hitting it and hitting it until it fell apart, broken beyond repair.

"Aaand buuuttlleeer?" he wondered. For some reason those two memories were mixed together, but he could not figure out why.

His mates seemed to be more focused, better prepared for combat, as they smelled the air and listened to the sound of animals nearby.

He prefered to rest instead, althought a part of him felt drawn to the same state of the others.

Is the barn's owner in it right now? Just wondering...

On november 23, 2012
Draink
Draink

Draink lifted the stripped sheet metal, putting one aching foot in front of the other. His ankles were on fire, hot to the touch. He wiped a film of sweat, but then noticing the stick of metal collapsing into the vast meadow. He cured, laying the car door with other resources from the car down, then reaching for the singed metal.

He realized something, that this was new life. Pillage what others constructed before the plague.
On november 23, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one regained focus after a while of letting his mind rest. He woke up inspired, apparently. "Huuunnteer?" he said, remembering the smell he felt earlier on, the smell of that familiar stranger.

He had a vague image, only that, of Hunter. He knew that he had met him somewhere before. Maybe he could fill the voids of his memory?

As he glanced at his group, he saw them calm again. They had fed on some chickens that were nearby, apparently. They had brought him a piece, and as he saw it he realized the hunger he had postponed.

"Thaankss..." he said as he took the chicken and ate it. It wasn't tasty, if that was even the word for it. But it calmed him enough to think. He started to examine his surroundings, to make a plan.

On november 24, 2012
065tdsa

65After lots of work, the plan was ready. It was a genius plan, in the smart one's humble opinion. And he wasn't wrong.

And so his forces stood, now armed with an assorment of rusted metals taken from tools that were lying around the barn.

They also had been armored with wooden planks, metal plates and whatever scrap that the smart one could adapt.

The helmets were a tricky part, but he was very keen on protecting the head. He knew it had to be important.

There were two major problems. After examination the one who had been pecked was apparently blind. and the torso was a torso.

They solved eachother, as the torso now served as eyes for the blind zombie, in exchange for transportation.

"Weee aarree seeett..."said the smart one satisfied as it was all ready.

For those who lost track:
Gut-less zombie 1
Gut-less zombie 2 (dead)
Muscular but earless zombie
Torso
Blind(pecked) zombie
On november 25, 2012
Snap

Name: Sam
Gender:Male
Age:20
Appearance:Slightly bulky athletic build, dirty blonde hair, a white T-shirt that is drenched and has sand all over it, and blue jeans.
Weapons: His wits.(besides his fists)
Perks: Has lots of heart, can stay calm in tense situations, very durable, able to withstand alot of punishment because of years of being a pro Boxer. Good moral standing, has incredible luck.

Sam limped out of the plane wreckage as if he had just gone through the gates of Hell and got out alive. He was a little shaken up, but he started looking for what was in the plane passengers luggage while thinking about how lucky he was to be the only survivor. He found a small canteen of water. Sam then wrote down directions on a piece of paper where the plane was so he could scavenge it some more, before finding a tent with some survivors.

HunterSo he's definitely smarter than average. I should find a way to take out some of them before they get loose and those helmets aren't gonna make it any easier. Hunter sees the barn is dry as a bone and realizes this is a perfect opportunity too possibly kill all of the zombies inside. Hunter shuts the door as quietly as he can and bars it, keeping it from opening with his sword. He then collects some firewood and a stone and sets the firewood at the door. He then takes his sword and the stone using them to make sparks on the firewood, which lights quickly.

I can't leave my sword in case the hilt melts. Hopefully they're too slow or won't notice before it's too late. He then runs away, with the nagging thought that maybe he could have helped 65.

On november 25, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one had a peculiar smell in his nose. It didn't take long for the fire to spread and show, and he realised that it was time to make an exit. Literally.

"Kiiiids, Tiiiimeee fooor aattaackk!" he said as he smashed a spot in the walls that he had previously canibalized (not literally) planks from.

The attack proved most effective as all of them followed the command. The wall fell to the combined strength of the group. "Baaattlee teesteed..." said the smart one, most satisfied.

After little examination, and while the barn consumed, it was evident that the fire was as intentional as it was effective.

A few pieces of burning wood would make fine aditions to his equipment, he thought, as night was falling...

It is about time we have a night phase.

065tdsa

65"Weeeiiird..." thought the smart one as he saw that human's pathetic escape. His group wanted to go after him, but he ordered to regroup with the arriving division instead.

He saw them shambling around without any combat order whatsoever. He went over to one who seemed to have a little more brains in him than the rest and asked him "Whooo iiiss yoouuur leeaadeer?"

He merely responded "Leeeeaaadeeeer?" As he realised that his group was nothing but another horde with no coordination, he went towards the top of the small hill that the human had climbed over.

Then he screamed screamed "Iii AaaM YOooUuuR LEeeAaaDEeR! Fooolloow mee!"

Draink

Draink set the metal strips in the storage compartment, something eerie hitting his gut. He turned to one of the tents, its insides vibrating the outside in a spasm. He stomped nearly to the tent, a wet gurgle, and the wrinkled shelter. "Chris... Keith..."

Hesitantly, his fingers slid down the fastening band. "Oh shi-!"

Alex
The now undead Alex stared back at Draink, its milky eyes washing through Draink. He sniffed the air, before lunging.
Chris
Chris desperately tried to get the aim settled on the submachine gun, but to no avail. The two shook like a lion on an antelope.

MadDonut
Theminitroopers......do i have to change it?

I'm not a part of this RP, but I am a bit of a Role-player. Given this universe seems to be some sort of clash between reality and Die2nite, I think an Anti-Material Rifle is a big no-no.

A) It sounds pretty damn OP (Over Powered).
B) It doesn't fit within the universe that the roleplay takes place in.

Draink

Bold = DEAD / UNDEAD LAST TIME SEEN
Italics = UNKNOWN, LAST SEEN LOST, UNSECURED, INJURED, OR HASN'T BEEN SEEN FOR A WHILE.



Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.

Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.


Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 (real name: unknown)
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).

Name : Chris
Gender : Male
Age : 20
Appearance : Scavenging backpack, tanktop, dirty pants, sandy shoes.
Weapons : Škorpion and Katana
Perks : Great at hand to hand combat and has knowledge on first aid.

Name: Hunter
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Appearance: Completely covered in midnight black clothes with lots of pockets and cloth with eye holes covered by goggles wrapped around his head. (can seem shady sometimes because of the outfit)
Weapon: Battery Launcher
Perks: Stealth, if you've got something you want done without much noise or unconcealed motion he's your man.

Name : Keith
Gender : Male
Age : 14
Appearance : Small, black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots
Weapons : A baton
Items : 2 cans of dog food
Perks : Good at close combat, has a tamed police dog

Name : Ruff
Gender : Male
Age : [Wtf??]
Appearance :Brown? Wears a police cap with a not-so-shiny crest.
Eats : Meat, Bones, Dog food
Perks : Able to understand his owner, Keith.

Moves : ((Basic moves such as eat not mentioned))
Leaping - Ruff leaps at a target's face. [LEAP]
Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

Name: Draink
Gender: Male
Age: 29
Appearance: Brown skin with a 5 o clock shadow, chipped shorts and oil-greased white T-shirt with dirt splatters.
Weapon: Rusty Chain
Perks: Hearing, observant, with a bucket full of architecture and digging (wells)

Name: Vel
Gender: Male
Age: 19
Appearance: Blond-haired, a somewhat athletic body, brown leather trousers with a ripped blue-shirt underneath.
Weapon: A pitchfork and a screwdriver
Perks: Quite a good farmer and has a formidable strength for his age.

Name: Travis
Gender: Male
Age: 32
Appearance: Burly man with sideburns, sports a Van Dyke style beard. He wears a dark green shirt and long, black pants that shake the hands of his sneakers. Black running shoes. African-American
Weapon: None.
Perks: Guardsman, ideal protection. Marksman with medium-range weapons.

Name: Brandon
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to early thirties
Appearance: Pale, brown shaggy hair that is overgrown. Multiple burn wounds across neck and chest, bandaged injury on knee. Gray shorts and flannel shirt. No shoes, blanket draped on. Caucasian.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Scavenging, useless now because of injuries from gas station explosions.

Name: Abraham Simmons
Gender: Male
Age: 27
Race: American-Indian
Appearance: A somewhat muscular man with clean cut hair, and a short-trimmed beard/mustache. He's wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with a medium-sized riot helmet on. He has dark blue boot-cut jeans and dark blue running sneakers.
Weapon: Steel Crowbar and a pocket knife.
Perks: Exceptional hearing, free runner, and a scavenger.

Name: Dick Chappy
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Wears a blood soaked gas mask and soldier dessert camouflage.
Weapon: Desert eagle (8 bullets) and a hatchet
Perks: The Experience of being in isolated areas made him into a real survivalist.

Name: Sam
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Slightly bulky athletic build, dirty blonde hair, a white T-shirt that is drenched and has sand all over it, and blue jeans.
Weapons: His wits. (besides his fists)
Perks: Has lots of heart, can stay calm in tense situations, very durable, able to withstand a lot of punishment because of years of being a pro Boxer. Good moral standing has incredible luck.

Name: Hank Creeper
Gender: Male
Age: 16
Appearance: Tight jeans and an over-sized white T-shirt. Gray eyes and short black hair.
Weapons: A plank with a nail in it.
Perks: He was an orphan with no friends. He doesn't get affected by depression, sadness, or any of that stuff. He was often beaten up on so he can take a few hits no problem. He also can give a few good punches. (extra melee and hand-to-hand)

Name: Jack
Gender: Male
Age: 18
Appearance: Wears a beret and a leather jacket.
Weapon: Serrated knife (????)
Perks: Spotting and stealth.
How he got here: he was dispatched by the British army to help contain the infection.

065tdsa

65The smart one got 38 recruits out of that horde, no more, no less. The rest seemed to be beyond salvation, they only responded to loud or shiny...


His new recruits were however difficult to control. The smart one thought it must have been the hunger, so he lead them through the country-side looking for food.

They eventually reached a big farm in which he could see plenty of cows and other animals. While most of them went over there, he entered the big house in the center of it, looking for something to equip his new recruits.

What he found was very different.

On november 26, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one was staring at the wardrobe in that room of the farm house as it heard the fast breathing of the one within it.

He reached out for the door slowly, and then the one inside there stopped breathing and was very quiet. The smart one was most intriged by this one. He had met friends, and foes, but none who refused a fight.

"Yooouuu... Scaaareed?" he asked. The one inside the wardrobe was very quiet. He could see a figure through the door, it was rather small.

"Iii scaareed toooo, soomeetiimeess..." said the smart one, and he sat down next to the wardrobe. His stomach told him there was food in there, but his head said there was someone in there.
And following his head seemed to pay off so far.

Eventually, he heard a soft voice, a girl's voice, coming from the inside of the wardrobe. "You... You are not like the others?" she said.

"Iii Thiink moree." answered the smart one, and they stayed there for a while, as the horde fed on the cattle outside.
Here you go, a fine piece of plot.

Travis
"Nothin'" Travis heads back down the steep hill after a brief on look of the plains below where a ruined settlement stood. "There's a village, I see a couple of them roaming 'bout."
Richard
Richard stiffens his grip on the handgun, nodding. "Griffonn was off by the coast, took it hard after he couldn't help this guy, Alex, who died. Might've taken a stroll."
Travis
"And the girl?" Travis added, walking into Richard from the rocky hill.
Richard
Richard could hardly remember. Was Bea at her tent or outside? "Don't recall, Richard could now see the settlements, which sported barbed wire, the rots attached to the device, intestines tangled into the bloody wire. There were multiple deflated tents, and one brick house with a crinkled paper that addressed the building's purpose: storaging.
Travis

"Ready?" Travis held the rusty knife inches away from him, hand against the knob. He inclined his view, watching the rotters scatter across the field like checkers. "Now!" He hissed, cranking open the door.

Before Travis could react, the ravaged aperture collapsed onto Travis. The rotters inside taking quick notice as they moaned in delight.

Draink

Off: Cannot edit

Richard

Richard's eyes beat at the incoming undead, unsure what to do, he raises the handgun and fires. The bullet explodes the shoulder of the nearest infected. He cursed his attempt before shooting again, this time the stiff corpse-walker fell to its death.

The remaining 3 growled and hurdled towards the two. "Shit!" He expelled 2 more but the rest continued, now crouching and seemingly helped Travis, but in return dragged his numb feet across the hardwood flooring. Travis' screams did nothing but pump fear into Richard.

He watched in shock as one rotter, a former resident with dusty blonde hair, sink its velvet teeth into Travis' ankle. Travis pulled back the sucking head with a wet pop.

Travis
"Nononono."
Richard
He broke out of the enchanted spell and felt his finger eject several cartridges, without a further whimper, he reached for the groaning Travis whose eyes were ghostly white. The bite didn't look any better.

EDITED
Name : Robin
Gender : Male ZOMBIE
Age : Infinite
Appearance : Torn and tattered clothes
Weapons : Some sand
Perks : Stealth
Moves :
Plank - Robin slides backward to lay flat on the ground in a flash
Trip - Robin attempts to trip a target by assaulting his legs
Dodge - Robin slides in a direction to dodge incoming
Blind - Robin sprinkles sand into a target's eyes to blind temporarily
RobinRobin followed the group to the countryside, to a big farm in search for food. There were plenty of cows, chickens and ducks. 4 zombies, including Robin, charged at the cows. 11 zombies feasted on the chickens leaving the rest to catch the ducks, with a minimal chance to fall into the pond and DIE. However, 3 fools wandered off aimlessly.

Draink

Draink looked at his stubborn scratch, it ached and made him woozy at the sight of the crimson blood. Then, suddenly it paused and didn't bleed. He shook it off, but still winced at the pain.

Only the nails had sliced through his wrist, not the skin nor the teeth of the dead rotter. Draink arched his back, cracking it in several places before exiting the shack.

Draink
"Ehyo! Hold it right there." Draink noticed the man as he walked closer, a set of syringes lined up his clothing. The man looked like a clown, but then he settled a weapon.
Scientist
"Beg pardon?" says the scientist, assembling two battery launchers.
Hunter
Hunter rose from Hank's side, jerking forward the battery launcher. He strung up his goggles, his eyes laying on the scientist now. "Watch it, rubberneck."
Scientist
"Take it easy, I mean no harm," He replied, and with a sinister smile he began lowering the two identical battery launchers.
Hunter

Draink

Draink doesn't even need to gawk to see that whatever just happened was not good. Anger built inside him, grief for Chris who lay paralyzed on the dirt while the scientist in the formal cotton stripped shirt laughed berserkly as would a maniac.

"What the fuck!?" Draink took several positions back, un-latching the rusty chain. "Stay the hell back you damn psycho!" He swings as a threat and the scientist starts laughing more. Draink looked down at Chris whose gun lay strewn on the floor, clenching his punctured arm as well his gut, light spores producing red patches on his face and throat.

"Get the hell away, now."

Hank
Hank stood up from his crouching position in the camp to see the startling commotion. He gripped onto his plank off timber.

Draink

He takes a deep grunt after the scientist falls cross-eyed onto his wobbly knees and into the gravel. He nods to Hank before rushing over to Chris. "This is not good, get him inside and shut the gates dammit."

As they rush Chris inside, Draink looks at his scratch, not sure whether to address the group. The tips of the rotter's nails only fell into his skin, not the rest of the decayed finger.

He glanced back at the scientist. How did he know they were here? More importantly, how long had this group been watched even before Draink met them?

He walks toward the dead scientist, staring for a while at the cold, dead corpse. He took the two battery launchers then shut the newly-built gates, while noticing no rotters suggesting to dine on the cadaver.

065tdsa

65After some time the noises coming from the area of the farm had stopped. The group was well fed.

In the meantime, the smart one and the girl had had a rather interesting conversation.

The girl, whose name was Anne, told him about her life in the farm, and about the beggining of the zombie invasions. She told him how she had stayed hidden in that wardrobe for many days, terrified and unable to do anything.

The smart one, who couldn't remember his name, told her about how he began leading the others, considering it his purpose, and how he looked for clues to find out who he was.

"Sooo",said the smart one, "Ii doon't knoow whoo Ii was, aand youu doon't knoow whoo yoou'll bee..." He thought for a few seconds and then added "Ii heelp youu aand youu heelp mee?"

"And your... friends?" said Anne, visibly concerned.

"Ii leeadeer, oor ii cleeavee theem. Theey piick," said the smart one. Then he added, "Yoou mooree liike mee. Yoou thiink."

065tdsa

65The smart one and Anne went down stairs. He was rather confident on his skills to control his group, while she was very much scared, for if things went the wrong way, those would be way too many zombies to kill.

As they exited the farm house, a very inconvenient breeze brought her smell to the zombies, and all of them turned from the carcasses that had them busy at once.

The original squad approached first. They had some meat thay had set aside, but they dropped it on the ground as they approched, more interested for the new food.

"Doon't," the smart one told them,"shee iis noo foood!"
They were rather confused, but they wouldn't go further. But it wasn't guarranteed that the others would recieve the message.

And Hank, there's more? o.o What if they're a band of ghouls? Like World War Z mushed in D2N ghouls, but with traps (bear traps, stalking, etc.)

Travis
Travis started to tremble, cold sweat beading down his lip as he turned around to see 8 of the living dead stomping across the fallen town.
Richard
".. I'm sorry....." Richard quivered, raising his head to the crowd of infected.
Travis
"Watcha' mean? We gotta go man."
Richard
"I'm empty, we're surrounded..." then he tried to smile, but was overtaken as he saw the former town residents advancing. "And you're tagged...."
Travis

"Don't give up! We can do this, let's go!" Travis said, wincing as he pushed Richard out of the way of the grasp of a chomping woman, her cataracted eyes coated with yellow slime. Her teeth shattered the flesh in Travis' bad arm, in her mouth was his bloody skin. Travis screamed in pain, lifting the serrated knife and ripping open her scalp.

"GO!" He kicked her gut, sending her corpse into the hands of two reanimated men, falling with the loose corpse. He cringed as the burning ache in his wounded arm shook him. He subsided the affliction and took out two more. "There's a ladder over there by the watchtower, go to it hurry!"

Richard
He nodded reasonably, trying to comprehend the situation as he backed off and up the rusty ladder, watching out for the dead corpses of the townspeople. He flinched as his hands met the ladder steps once Travis breathed horridly, grunting as the repeated cracks of the townspeople's head split in halves, followed by a distant thud.
On december 1, 2012
065tdsa

65And indeed they did not. As they started advancing and the smart one kept them away from Anne, they became more and more aggresive.

One of them, a fairly big one, charged forward, but the smart one swinged his weapon with great strenght and killed him in one hit.

In the meanwhile, another two had approached Anne from the other side. She screamed as they went after her, but they both had their heads pierced by rusty metal.

As the smart one looked in that direction he could see his loyal companions fighting off the others."Tooo theee hoouusee!", he ordered, and they made a slow retreat, hitting the enemies as they fell back.

Anne was rushing inside pretty fast when he grabbed her and told her "Staay cloosee, theeey folloow youu" and signaled her a place near a window, to attract the zombies to a bottle neck.
He was pretty sure it would work.

Richard

Richard was mid-way up the steps but soon he heard a slight crackle differ from the casual sounds of undead moans and heavy thuds. He looked at the rails and saw the orange colored screws giving away at his weight. He thought fast, trying to get to the top. His left arm met the head of the watchtower but soon the ladder collapsed, hitting dusty floor.

He grasped the wood and pulled himself up with a grunt, hitting the interior. He crab walked back and hit a sheet of metal, not daring to look back at the courtyard.

"Baack!" he screamed, and showed the forces the way across the house and to a back door. They weren't surrounded, but they had to be fast to make an exit.

AT THE FALLEN TOWN:

Richard

Soon the snickering growls of the undead loosened, Richard, curious, attempted to peek out the watchtower but the moment was ineffectual as he saw Travis sprawled on the courtyard of the village with the surviving rotters lingering around the corpse, behind them were their fallen comrades.

Travis went down fighting, as Richard noticed the leader of the pack dropping the intestine, draping it back on the body, and glaring back him with the blade protruding into his shoulder.

On december 6, 2012
065tdsa

65They managed to make it out cleanly, but they were still being followed. However, the smart one's squad was coordinated, and they at least runned without getting in front of eachother.

Maybe so many "Oneees" weren't for nothing, thought the smart one as they lost sight of the ones behind them, upon entering the forest.

He then turned towards Anne and said "Youuu aree onee of us noow. Wee heelp youu, youu doo whaat youu can too heelp uus".

She thought about it for a second. He helped her, all of them, when it was much easier for them to do anything else. But, ¿what could I do to help them? she thought I am just a girl.

She considered it as she observed them move through the thick woods. Well, I am faster than they are, and I can actually report back... she thought."I will go ahead and see whats up", she said to the smart one, and quickly left.

The smart one was happy as he said "Ook, buut caarefuully" to the girl that was already running. He couldn't see ahead properly, nor move much faster than his own, but the girl sprinted through the woods with ease.

AT THE FALLEN TOWN:

Richard
Richard felt the elusive watchtower shake out of balance, but it a quick decision he made the his red tie coil around the splintering wood, buying him a couple seconds to get off. He landed on the courtyard, the leader of the pack slipped its view from him and continued at Travis' forearm.
Fallen Town Survivor #1
He brought up the bent penknife with cautiousness, making no intention on viewing the munching rotters he hissed, "Its... its a person!"
Fallen Town Survivor #2
The dark-skin toned man saw the eerie scene, the posse of former neighbors and the unknown were circled around a meal. "Who are you?"
Fallen Town Survivor #3
"You mean, who the hell is he, and what is he doin' here?" This voice was feminine, but equally as rough as the African man.
Fallen Town Survivor #2
The survivor pulled out a fairly big orange box cutter, eying a rotter who motioned from the corpse and dragged its heels to the four of them. He galloped over briskly before impaling the undead man in the under mandible, then throwing the now dead man to the grassy dirt. "Answer her."
Richard
He hesitated, but made the masculine man more impatient. "Richard....."
Fallen Town Survivor #2
"Stop the damn games! We have to move, now Malik." By then, a handful of the condemned rotters rose from the body of Travis and went the way the decomposed man that was put down went.

((OOC: Been reading this for a while, thought I might as well join it))

Officer Morrison
Gender: Male
Age: Late 20s to Early 30s
Appearance: Patrol uniform, hat, blue eyes.
Weapon: .44 caliber magnum revolver.
Perks: Patrol car, experiences with pressured situations, calmed resolve.

MorrisonMorrison drove down the road in his patrol car, hoping to find some fuel nearby. as a loud clunk came from his engine, signifying him having run out of fuel, Morrison simply cursed loudly, and repeatedly tried to restart the engine to no avail.As he looked forward, only the endless road greeted him. Thoughts ran through his mind Isn't there meant to be a town around here? Maybe it isn't abandoned.
Morrison took a road flare from his bad of supplies, and let it up. Waiting 10 minutes, he was almost certain there weren't any zeds within a few meters of him. After this, he set off towards the town, checking his compass and map.

On december 8, 2012
alwaysmetara

Bea It had been weeks since she last saw a fellow human being... Not counting the zombies, of course. But that was quite alright with her. It was easy to hide since she had found the worn, dirty cloak snagged on a branch. Wearing that, the zombies couldn't even see her.
However, today when she was on the way to refill her water from a little spring she found, she thought I saw someone in the distance. Someone whose stride was too purposeful to be a zombie.
Bea shrugged and put on her cloak. I probably just imagined that, she thought.

Off: I'm back!

On december 8, 2012
Draink
alwaysmetaraOff: what happened while I was gone?

Well

Bold = DEAD / UNDEAD LAST TIME SEEN
Italics = UNKNOWN, LAST SEEN LOST, UNSECURED, INJURED, OR HASN'T BEEN SEEN FOR A WHILE.


Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.

Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.

Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.
Alex

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: Glock 17 (empty).
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 (real name: unknown) UNDEAD
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).

Name : Chris
Gender : Male
Age : 20
Appearance : Scavenging backpack, tanktop, dirty pants, sandy shoes.
Weapons : Škorpion and Katana
Perks : Great at hand to hand combat and has knowledge on first aid.

Name: Hunter
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Appearance: Completely covered in midnight black clothes with lots of pockets and cloth with eye holes covered by goggles wrapped around his head. (can seem shady sometimes because of the outfit)
Weapon: Battery Launcher
Perks: Stealth, if you've got something you want done without much noise or unconcealed motion he's your man.

Name: Keith
Gender: Male
Age : 14
Appearance : Small, black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots
Weapons : A baton
Items : 2 cans of dog food
Perks : Good at close combat, has a tamed police dog

Name : Ruff
Gender : Male
Age : [Wtf??]
Appearance :Brown? Wears a police cap with a not-so-shiny crest.
Eats : Meat, Bones, Dog food
Perks : Able to understand his owner, Keith.

Moves : ((Basic moves such as eat not mentioned))
Leaping - Ruff leaps at a target's face. [LEAP]
Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

Name: Draink
Gender: Male
Age: 29
Appearance: Brown skin with a 5 o clock shadow, chipped shorts and oil-greased white T-shirt with dirt splatters.
Weapon: Rusty Chain
Perks: Hearing, observant, with a bucket full of architecture and digging (wells)

Name: Vel
Gender: Male
Age: 19
Appearance: Blond-haired, a somewhat athletic body, brown leather trousers with a ripped blue-shirt underneath.
Weapon: A pitchfork and a screwdriver
Perks: Quite a good farmer and has a formidable strength for his age.

Name: Travis
Gender: Male
Age: 32
Appearance: Burly man with sideburns, sports a Van Dyke style beard. He wears a dark green shirt and long, black pants that shake the hands of his sneakers. Black running shoes. African-American
Weapon: None.
Perks: Guardsman, ideal protection. Marksman with medium-range weapons.

Name: Brandon
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to early thirties
Appearance: Pale, brown shaggy hair that is overgrown. Multiple burn wounds across neck and chest, bandaged injury on knee. Gray shorts and flannel shirt. No shoes, blanket draped on. Caucasian.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Scavenging, useless now because of injuries from gas station explosions.

Name: Abraham Simmons
Gender: Male
Age: 27
Race: American-Indian
Appearance: A somewhat muscular man with clean cut hair, and a short-trimmed beard/mustache. He's wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with a medium-sized riot helmet on. He has dark blue boot-cut jeans and dark blue running sneakers.
Weapon: Steel Crowbar and a pocket knife.
Perks: Exceptional hearing, free runner, and a scavenger.

Name: Dick Chappy
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Wears a blood soaked gas mask and soldier dessert camouflage.
Weapon: Desert eagle (8 bullets) and a hatchet
Perks: The Experience of being in isolated areas made him into a real survivalist.


Name: Anne
Gender: Female
Age: 10
Appearance: A girl in regular clothes, that are mostly in good shape (at least up until this point).
Weapon: None (so far?)
Perk: None (so far?)


Name: Sam
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Slightly bulky athletic build, dirty blonde hair, a white T-shirt that is drenched and has sand all over it, and blue jeans.
Weapons: His wits. (besides his fists)
Perks: Has lots of heart, can stay calm in tense situations, very durable, able to withstand a lot of punishment because of years of being a pro Boxer. Good moral standing has incredible luck.

Name: Hank Creeper
Gender: Male
Age: 16
Appearance: Tight jeans and an over-sized white T-shirt. Gray eyes and short black hair.
Weapons: A plank with a nail in it.
Perks: He was an orphan with no friends. He doesn't get affected by depression, sadness, or any of that stuff. He was often beaten up on so he can take a few hits no problem. He also can give a few good punches. (extra melee and hand-to-hand)

Name: Jack
Gender: Male
Age: 18
Appearance: Wears a beret and a leather jacket.
Weapon: Serrated knife and... aqua-splash? o.o
Perks: Spotting and stealth.
How he got here: he was dispatched by the British army to help contain the infection.

Name : Robin
Gender : Male ZOMBIE
Age : Infinite
Appearance : Torn and tattered clothes
Weapons : Some sand
Perks : Stealth

(3 others, both alive.)
Name:???
Age:???
Gender: Male.
Occupation: Scientist.
Weapons: 2X battery launcher, set of needles.
Perks: completely evil.

Name: Jonas
Age: 33
Appearance: A thick leather jacket with a T-shirt under it. Black jeans, with some gray working shoes. A big survival backpack. A long beard.
Weapon: A bloody iron axe
Perks: Night owl

Name: Merc
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to mid-twenties.
Appearance: Caucasian. Tan shirt, baggy shorts, and running shoes.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Very smart and runs fast.


Name: Angela
Gender: Female
Age: Late teens to early twenties
Appearance: Buttoned shirt with green tank-top underneath, basic long shorts.
Weapon: (unknown)
Perks: High stamina, athletic.

Malik
Gender: Male
Age: Early thirties.
Appearance: African-American, brown cargo shorts, long sleeved buttoned shirt (rolled up to elbows)
Weapon: none.
Perks: Planning and leadership.

tl;dr

new characters, several dead. Plot twists!

I'm going to break up the characters into sections and places by the way will post when done.
