BEACH CAMP SURVIVORS

Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.

Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.

Age : 18

On december 8, 2012
hankolijo

Mute kid dude. Add that to the list. I have a major plot twist in store.
Hank"Any way..." Hank sed, realizing he had made it awkward.
"Is that a child?"
They walked to the little boy. He looked 11 or 12.
"Hey little guy."Hank sed"Cute rat..."
Hank squeaked a few times, and the rat went up on his shoulder.
"Whats your name?"
The boy just blindly stared in to the distance...
Mute boy.Scruffs liked the man. But he didn't care... he knew what happens when you care. He knew what happens to the ones you care about...
He didn't care....
On december 8, 2012
065tdsa

AnneAnne was just about to go back and report, when she snapped a twig, and one of the zombies turned towards her.

She tried staying quiet, but apparently the zombie was heading there to check, and she knew it would have discovered her, so she ran out.

65The smart one was, in the meanwhile, leading the rest of them as hey slowly went through the woods. He was frustrated by how easy it was for some of partners to stray away from the group.

He then saw Anne coming, and asked "Whaat?", and she responded "A small pack is after me,, they are slower though, and not very coordinated".

The smart one thought about the posibilties a bit, and said "Wee wiill taalk".

AnneShe wasn't happy about the plan, but we went to the back of the small formation as she thought "Well, i guess they deserve a chance..."

BlackVoid

Hunter"Alright then." Hunter loads some batteries into the battery gun and shoots the trailing ones right through the head to draw the others away from the girl.
On december 8, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one heard the sound of the shots and screamed to his group "Takeee Cooover!" as he went behind a tree.

As he saw the shots had killed the ones chasing Anne, he thought Well, that's one thing off of my plate, but right now i wouldn't mind reinforcements...

He then considered the situation: We are out ranged, and not exactly fast, he thought inmediatly, and he couldn't really see a way through that.

But then he had an idea. They aren't aiming for Anne, he thought, so she can help us make a get away, if she is up to the task...

"Maake aa diversioon," he told her "theey woont shoot youu."She seemed conflicted with the idea, so he reasued her "Wee wiill beee riight heere".

She then ran out, calling for the shooter's attention, as she ran in another direction.
On december 8, 2012
Draink
Draink

Draink raised the axe and planted the edge into a confused rotter. Spittle spewed from his lips as he pulled the hefty axe out of the dying corpse, guttural speech escaping from it.

"We ain't got time! Hank, get the kid and move!" He switched view to the defense, centering the axe toe into the shoulder of a man in overalls and booting him in the gut, but then realized 7 others nearing him. He lifted the axe with a grunt, but then stopped, puzzled as he sighted a young lassie in perfectly good clothing, just like he saw before.

This time it wasn't an imagination. "Come ova' here!" He shouted, pushing a near woman to the prickly grass with the shoulder of the axe.
On december 8, 2012
BlackVoid

HunterBefore the other 6 get to Draink, Hunter straps the battery launcher to his back and cuts off their heads. "There should only be a few left."
On december 8, 2012
065tdsa

AnneAnne was running away from the area of the combat as heard one of the people there calling her. She stopped and looked at him.

As she saw them there, fighting the group which had been very close to catch her just a while ago, she thought about going with them, but decided to continue with the plan.

Chances were they wouldn't understand anyway, and she didn't want to pay the zombie's kindness by getting them killed.

So she kept running, at a distance, around the fight and following the edge of the woods.

On december 8, 2012
Snap

Sam
Sam saw all this commotion and quickly ran over to the warzone. He saw a girl running from a pack of zombies, he tried to distract the zombies away from her so he could lure them to a trap he had set up.

20= The trap fails and Sam is still being chased.
50= The trap works, but it only traps half of the 4 zombies.
70= The trap kills all of the zombies.

34
On december 8, 2012
Draink
Draink

Draink watched as the burly man attempt to follow the girl, but with a handful of rotters dragging themselves by. He gave Hunter a brisk nod before trampling into the trees, striking two townspeople in business clothing into the wild grass.

He put both knees on both bodies and brought himself up, shouting after the stray survivor.
On december 8, 2012
BlackVoid

HunterHunter sprints and easily catches up to Sam. "Slow down, we had the situation under control and she doesn't look like she wants anything to do with us."
On december 8, 2012
065tdsa

AnneAs she was running, Anne noticed that she wasn't quite succeding at drawing their attention. After they were done with those zombies they would move forth.

And, there was already one of them very close to where the zombies hid. I need to find a way to send them somewhere else... she thought.

She then had an idea. I'll go with them and make sure they don't spot the guys. Then i can run off, she decided, and started approaching the two of them that were closer.

LEEEEERROOOOOY JENK-

AT THE FALLEN TOWN:

Malik
"The door'll hold a few," Malik breathed out, relieved after the fight. "No who are you?" He asked after Richard shook Merc's stiff hand.
Angela
"He got all the bozos swarmin' around us."
Richard
"I'm sorry..."
Angela
"Do you think that counts, huh? I had to see my friends back there," pointing a shaking finger at the courtyard.
Merc
"Aye, back off'em Ange-"
Angela
"This prick....." she said with a look of disgust.
Richard
"I lost someone out there... just fucking back off, all right?!" He watched Angela back off down the hall and into a classroom.
Malik
He wiped a film of sweat and patted Richard's shoulder. "Our shelter fell three days ago, she'll get over it," He said with a smile.
Richard
"I'm Richard, me and several others are set up on the beach shore."
Merc
"I never liked the beach."
Malik
He chuckled, "Inerestin', think we can join? We'll pull our weight."

10

Less than 35 = No.

36-70 = Maybe.

71-100 = Sure.
On december 8, 2012
Draink
Richard
"I don't know, I'm not the leader of the group."
Malik
"We'll we can wait.
Angela
She walked out of the classroom holding a smoldering wooden ruler. "Mathematics'll do us good now, we can go back to the main office now."

I guess its been a month or so after the beach camp was established?

On december 9, 2012
hankolijo

HankHank grabbed the boy, pulling him out of combat.
The little rat on his shoulder squeaked relentlessly.
"Don't worry, we'll get you to safety!"
Hank saw the cave. He also saw light....
"SURVIVORS"
He ran towards the are he saw the flames...
2 scientists looked at him.
He knew they wanted to know what happened to their friend.
<20 Hank fails to explain.
20-40 Hank explains how the scientist threatened them.
40-80 Hank convinces them that the scientist is still alive.
80> He convinces them that the scientist wen't suicidal.
100
On december 9, 2012
hankolijo

Off:Lucky throw huh?
HankHank shook a little, but kept his cool.
"We saw another scientist. Just an hour or 2 ago."
The scientists looked at Hank suspiciously
"He pointed his gun at us... He even stabbed one of our friends with a syringe...
But then he just killed himself... Like he felt guilty of something..."

Female scientist(scientist 2#)"He was always a bit insane... We will see whats wrong with your friend."

Hanklooking around he saw a lot of supplies. More than he saw in camp- IN A SINGLE CAVE!
"Uhhh might helping my other friends out there first? Their kinda getting attacked...



Soon Hank and the scientists ran out. They were wielding a more powerful battery launcher- they called it the "Devastator".
They blasted the remaining zombies surrounding Hunter and Draink.

On december 9, 2012
Draink
Draink
Draink went ahead, sniping out the ruined farmhouse, carcasses strewn about. He spotted the little girl once again at the edge of the treeline. "Stop!" He looked back at the battle, several undead still remaining but he spotted others there.

AT THE FALLEN TOWN/SCHOOL:

Merc
"The lights went out a week ago, generator buzzed out two weeks ago. I tried to fix'et..."
Angela
"Can it, there's 10 bozos."
Merc
"Well, this place is a damn maze, lady."
Malik
"Cut it out. Now, we can get to the office if we go that'a way," He said, fingering to the left passageway. "Richard, how many shots you got on you?"
Richard
Before he could figure out an answer, the sun light burst behind them, the impatient rotters snarling and clacking their teeth.
Malik
"Go! Shoot'em Richard!"

Richard
He looked back at Malik with a sour look.
Malik
"Dammit! Let's go!" The four galloped as one of the undead teachers stood interest from the others in the hallway. Malik landed the penknife into her throat, driving it out and then back in a couple centimeters above.
Merc
Merc took hold of the rocking chair, and in a grunting motion, threw it at the incoming rotters, buying them time to dash into the musky, dark school.
On december 12, 2012
Draink
Draink

Three of them came from the right, Draink hailing the axe into the first one, a growling man covered in grey blisters. The body slumped along the weeds as the other two dragged on by.

Draink found himself in the farmhouse away from the girl and the others, pushing weight onto the screen door as the two bashed on the foggy glass. 1 others followed in suit, nearly throwing Draink onto the floor.

Vel
"Get up!" The crazies fell into the room, met by a sudden swing of a pitchfork.
Draink
Draink recollected himself, registered the abrupt entrance of the one the others called a raider. It was just a teenager!

AT THE FALLEN TOWN:

Richard
Several clumps of shuffling figures hit the ground, the shadow of a penknife ending their function. Richard paused mid-step as Merc and Angela raced ahead, arguing at each other.
Malik

The penknife plummeted onto the hairy scalp of an old resident of the town who always had nice, white teeth. Still they were as before, up until the point as his body slumped on the floor.

The handle came back from the swing, the blade missing. Useless, he thought, releasing the handle and running away from the outnumbering foes.

She felt more confident than ever before, she had ran around the woods with zombies, created diversions, and now standing up to the creepiest and deadliest guy she had ever met.

65The smart one could not remember that word, nothing more than a few meaningless images, and he showed sadness over that sensation that he had known what it meant, as he answered the question "Nooo".

But then, another one of them signalled Anne to attract her attention. It was Silent. He could not speak, but he nodded once.

"So you know what it is? Good, but do you know what a pharmacological lab is?" Anne asked. As a farm girl, even she wasn't quite sure how that would look. But Silent nodded with confidence.

Maybe he worked there, or in a similar place, Anne thought then, analizing his attitude. She had noticed how the smart one, who was obviously a soldier, behaved like a military leader of sorts.

Of course, he was naturaly smarter than the rest of them, but the others had already shown that they could learn things, so it was logical that they would also get smarter, and remember their past.

but then she heard something, there was someone looking for her. She made a sign for them to hide quickly, while she went back, and hoped that no one would find them...

You can find them if you want too, but you will have to search for them.

The plot goes on, and, just so you know, the zombies will start remembering and learning faster as they go (having other thinking beings around them makes them learn more from them and increases the chance for them to unlock their memories, as that recovery is triggered by specific events, objects or words).

Draink

TWENTY MILES NORTH
Introduction of the Religious Group

Preacher

Adulfus B. Henderson set his bible on the podium, staring down at the wandering people in the church lobby, mothers praying to the saints as they huddled children together.

Adulfus was a bold man, sturdy as a pole he glared at his guards outside from the windows. He would his His resurrection, the bishop of all.

Receptionist
"Adulfus? May I have a word?" The receptionist was in a white checkered shirt with dark blue pants, greeting the pastor with a warm handshake.

Adulfus
"Ah, yes, Anthony what is it that you wish to speak of? He said casually with a spirited smile.
Anthony
"Seward requests permission to head south, the area around us has become quite menacing."
Adulfus
"How is it menacing? Does it pose threat to our land?" He stated with a strict tone that resembled the word menacing.
Anthony
He gulped. "Its the cold. People are getting frostbite."
Adulfus

He eased his tense face, replying formally, "We must aim at the heavens," then he raised his voice, striking down his hands at the podium. "The lord shall guide us!"

Everyone cheered.

Young Girl
"I wanna see Christmas!
Adulfus
He cracked a grin. "You will child."

Name: Adulfus B. Henderson
Gender: Male
Age: Late forties to mid-fifties
Appearance: African-American man with salt and pepper hair in formal dark clothing.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Guidance, religion.

65The smart one and his group found themselves arriving at a large building which was surrounded by a big horde. According to Silent though, this wasn't the target.

The zombies around the area were very agitated as they tried to go inside. "Food..." 65 said to himself, guessing the reason for their agitation.

"Wee go aroound theem" he said then, and they surrounded the building, looking for another way in. They eventually found one, a back door that led them into a small room in the back.

The smart one smashed it until it opened, and they went in. There they saw a small bunch of people, apparently unarmed and being chased.

The smart one felt the hunger more than the others, since they had eaten almost a whole cow each, just a while ago, but he restrained himself, and made sure all of them stayed back.

They might be of assistance, he thought...

AT THE FALLEN TOWN:

Merc
The door was bolted shut in an instant, the stalking undead fixing a way to break the steel door as there icy hands banged on it. "It'll hold..."
Richard

The room was an eerie abyss of ash, lockers flung open with a few corpses sprawled onto the concrete tiles. Backpacks on the racks or on the ground, it was a mess.

The room was barely lit with the support of a few candles that seemed to be losing the fight against the cold. "How'll we get outta here?" He panted.

Malik
"We won't. We got the water to stay in here for a couple days."
Richard
Richard was impatient. "Look, my friends are back there. I need-"
Angela
"You don't have to do anything, see that?" She pointed at the door to the gymnasium. "That's death waiting to meet you!"

65As the smart one saw the humans locking themselves in that room, he thought, great, no this will be very tricky. He was correct, as to get them out of there, there were many hungry obstacles in the way.

"Baack!" he ordered to those by the door, as he approached to take control of the situation. As he observed it, he determined that it was not going to budge.

They aren't going to last there forever... decided the smart one, they have really cornered themselves. Then, he had a light bulb.

He remembered as they had gone around the building, a part of the wall that was weakened. We can tear it apart, with their help.

"Oopen!" he then screamed to the ones inside. "You caan't ouutlast us," he began, "but Ii caan help you if youu do the same..."

He moved his weapon around, and by then all of them understood better. They still moaned, but now they were away from the door, and quieter.

"Oopen!" he screamed again. "It's yoour only chaance!"

Merc

Malik

Then the bathroom door on Malik's left banged, heavy fists pounding the rotted door. Since the door was so decomposed, the first hits sparked a hole of splintered wood in the center. He stared in disbelief as behind him the undead sent the door crashing.

It was life or death now.
On december 21, 2012
065tdsa

65The smart one heard the sounds of wood breaking, and he deduced that some must have been in there...

He then heard other sounds, the sound he recognized as that of running water, and he had a flashback, of many like them disolving in contact with it.

"Baack..." he said, as it started coming out through the door slowly. His few followers backed off, but the horde behind them had no good senses.

They slowly strated melting until the water was contaminated completely by their remains. It is safe now, he observed, as he went back near the door.

"Oopen, unless yoou can laast there foorever!" he said. I doon't have time, he thought then, and even if i help them, how will i complete my mission with them?

"Maaybe..."he started saying, as he had an idea. "Silent, caan you go find the plaace, geet the stuff, and meet us at the beaach?" he asked then.

SilentSilent waited a second, and nodded. He was pretty sure to remember the route, and he had those memories of the place, like he had been there before... He was sure he could do it.

He slowly walked out of there. I'll do this fast and get right back, he thought, but more than being confident, he was attempting to reassure himself.

065tdsa
hankolijooff: might not be possible. We can't fast forward if Silent still has to get the drugs. OR we could have Silent pop up as in he found them and made it back or something.

He's still a zombie. That would take lots of explaining (also an epic scene most likely, because explaining is slower than shooting...). Besides, he still has to actually get them, but that won't take long.
Silent Silent walked through the streets, trying to think about the best way to make it to his objective. He knew what the lab was, he had been there.

He also remembered the antibiotics, or at least their recipients with inscriptions. Apparently the two would be mixed together... but that's not what he remembered.

As he walked around, he saw a tiny place with sign on top: "Pharmacy". He had another flashback: Several isles of diferent pills and other products. It's easier, and it's here, he determined, and went in there.

The place was thrashed, but there was some stuff still in it's place in the isles, and more in the back, and he started looking.

He spent a good while looking around, reading tiny labels and not entirely sure of what he was looking for, until he found it. Amoxicillin, this is it! he thought, as he remembered it clearly from somewhere...

To the beach now, and I hope the guys don't take too long... he concluded, and left the place. He would slowly but steadily backtrack his steps through the city and the woods.

65In the meanwhile, the smart one dealt with a problem that wouldn't resolve itself. "Idiiots!" he yelled, as he was done being pacient.

"FINEE!" he yelled then, as he had an idea "Noone on beeach camp is cooming to get you! Theey haave too much trouble alreaady too deal with IiDIOTS!"

AnneAnne took a sip of water and some of chocolate. "I guess we have supply problems..." she said, observing how little food and water there was.

"There were lots of cans at home, but i spent too much time eating and no time trying to get more..." she continued, not really caring if anyone payed attention.

On december 23, 2012
Griffonn

GriffonnOpening his eyes, Griffonn felt a dizzy nauseating feeling consume him. He felt something touching him ever so slightly across his body, and sticking inside his ears. Vision very hazy, Griffonn still managed to tell he was in some puddle of water, lying on his back.

Getting a grip of reality, he sat up weakly, and hunched over, peered at his surroundings.

"Where am I?"" He thought to himself.

Trying to remember, a piercing pain shot through his forehead, and upon touch, he noticed a gash on his head. The gash seemed old, though, and still open, it was covered in dried blood for the most part.

Still trying to remember, he could only remember meeting up with a group of survivors on a beach. Yes... He was, a butler? Yes, that too. Griffonn somewhat recalled a massive battle on the beach with huge amounts of walkers. He recalled being assigned to clean up the bodies, and then nothing else.

Checking himself for any means of clues to where he was or why he was here, he only found his familiar formal walking stick on him, along with a cracked pocket watch. His suit was ripped at one elbow, and his white once-shirt drenched on what looked like splatters of old blood and dirt, presumably from this filthy water he was lying in.

Speaking of the water, where was he again?
He continued his gaze upon his surrounding. Grffonn noted the walls were circular and made of some concrete material. There were many corridors branching off from up ahead, and all of a sudden, it hit him.

"Sewers... Am I... Underground?""

On december 23, 2012
Griffonn

Thanks! Great to be back!

GriffonnGetting on hands an knees, Griffonn had no idea which way to travel. Deciding to take the nearest branching corridor to the left, he followed it for nearly 100 meters before coming to a fork.

Looking down one of the corridors, he could see a faint light, and upon closer focus, it appeared to him to be the light of what looked like a sewer grate.

"Thank god I am inside the rainwater sewer systems..." he thought, quite relieved.

As Griffonn began crawling towards the faint eerie light, the circular corridor emptied out into a very large area, to which Griffonn could not see the bottom of. A catwalk (Presumably for maintenance) was hanging from the ceiling about 8 feet in front of him, and between the abruptly ended corridor and the hanging catwalk, remained a gap with an unknown, but obviously high, drop. This was all that separated Griffonn from the light of the outside world.

For precaution, Griffonn ripped a small chip off of the interior wall of the cement corridor, and tossed it down the 8 dark pit before him. Waiting nearly 10 seconds, Griffonn heard an echoed soft thump and bounce where the rock hit the ground.

This drop was high... 35 feet at least.

"This must be where the rainwater collects and distributes... Not a fun drop at all." He thought to himself, shaken by the thought of dying in such a way.


Adjusting himself in a stance that would give him maximum momentum, Griffonn was ready to Jump...

"5...
4...
3..."

And at the count of two, he heard a series of moans in back of him, and with the turn of his head, saw at least 9 zombie(s) crawling his direction. He had to jump, and he had to now!

GriffonnCrunched with time and under serious pressure, the 9 walkers crawled down the corridor closer. Griffonn had to jump.

Swaying his body, he prepared to launch his body.

3...
2...
And he sprung towards the catwalk, arms outstretched, moans in back of him, and darkness beneath him, he couldn't think, only react. 89
On december 23, 2012
Griffonn

GriffonnWith his arms outstretched, griffon felt the palms of his hand slam against the metal grids of the catwalk, and intertwined his fingers into it. His body felt heavy, but he was just able to full himself up on the catwalk.

As he lay there, he did not look up, but heard the nine moaning walkers reaching for him, and then one by one, fall into the darkness of the pit, only to be followed seconds later by a large thud. And a minute later, the moaning stopped. Exhausted and out of breath, Griffonn lay there, and ahead of him past the catwalk, was the sewer grate. Where ever he was, he was safe, for now anyways.

AT THE CHURCH

Adulfus
He walked through the hallway and climbed up the stairway, marking his look at the bulgy guard with pulled back hair near the window. The man is laughing to another guy who hits the floor several times with the butt of his rifle.
Fat Soldier
"Chester, you gotta lay off the chips, man!"
Chester Mendez
"Speak for yourself, Troy." He chomped down on the ripe tobacco.
Adulfus
He grimanced and remembered that Chester's sin would cause him good now, but eternal pain in the future. He continued the steps until he reached another hallway, two rooms on each side. He opened the one of the left.
Philip
"Well, well if it ain't Jesus Himself." The man was barely recognizable because of his clothing, dark green patches for a shirt and dark-stained trousers.
Adulfus
He smiled. "Glad to see you too, how is the surrounding?"
John Gibson
The creamy black skinned man beside Philip rested the wooden stock of the shotgun on his shoulder. "Tyrone is below, picking them off."
Adulfus
"Good," He turned to Philip, his smile loosening."I want you and Mendez at the crack of morning to head south. Is that clear?"
John
"Its fine by me."
Philip
Philip motioned to the bell tower. "We use that, attract the works of Satan."
Adulfus
He nodded and then his smile fell off at the sound of his opponent. "Careful with those words," He said sternly, then he went back down.

Name: Philip
Gender: Male
Age: 37
Appearance: Salt and pepper hair, no facial hair. Brown hair followed by a camouflaged shirt and black shorts.
Weapon: MP5 submachine gun
Perks: Good eyesight.

Name: Troy
Gender: Male
Age: 41
Appearance: This man has tan skin, brown eyes and spiky black hair which is sometimes quite matted.
He is 5' 8" and has a fat build. His clothes are usually quite garish and he prefers them to be loose. A notable feature is his distinctive laugh. People tend to find him unattractive, and he looks younger than he really is.
Weapon: Hunting rifle
Perks: Obedience and Trust.



Name: Chester Mendez
Gender: Male
Age: Early thirties to mid.
Appearance: Tan skinned man is 5' 4", has dark brown hair, blue eyes and a muscular build. Usually wears a silver necklace.
Weapon: Winchester 70 Bolt-Action
Perks: Good stamina and agility.

Name: Tyrone
Gender: Male
Age: Mid-twenties to early thirties.
Appearance: This cream skinned man is 5' 10", has long, brown hair, dark brown eyes and an athletic build. He has a small birthmark on his left hand.
Weapon: Spiked Bat.
Perks: Guarding, spotting.

Name: John Gibson
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Appearance: Very dark skin, dark green eyes and short, crazy dark blonde hair.
6' 1" with a fat build. Usually wears sporty clothes.
Weapon: Mossberg 500
Perks: Upbeat.

Adulfus
Adulfus stepped down the steps, watching as seven adults and three happy children playing, eating what was the last of the food. The food was actually just a liter of Pepsi and two granola bars that were equally divided amongst themselves.
Wesley
"Adulfus, come here please," The broad man with an average build plastered in white and black clothing stood in the doorway of an office.
Adulfus
"Yes? What is it?" He strolled into the office, following Wesley.
Wesley
He shut the door behind them, gesturing for Adulfus to sit down on one of the worn out chairs, Adulfus said no thank you. Wesley proceeded, "May I ask why you are sending the guards out there?"
Adulfus
"They followers, ugh, people are getting sick." He started to feel uncomfortable.
Wesley
"You're putting more people at risk! Charles died out there! So did Ruby!"
Adulfus
"Let me expla-"
Wesley
"No. That is final, you got that into your black ass? We are not sending anyone out there."
Adulfus
Adulfus nodded, feeling overwhelmed by Wesley's response. They both made way to the door, but as Wesley touched the door knob, Adulfus shot a blue pen into Wesley's neck.
Wesley
"... what are you..."
Adulfus

Adulfus sent it farther in, grabbing onto Wesley's body and lowering it to the floor. "May god bless your soul, and the satanic undead that follow suit."

He lifted the pen out and cupped Wesley's still mouth that wanted to shout and moan, then stabbed Wesley over and over.

Name: Wesley
Gender: Male
Age: Forties to fifties.
Appearance: This man has caramel skin, blue eyes and short, elaborately styled black hair. He has a flat nose. He is 6' 2" and has a thin build.His clothes are usually quite old fashioned and he prefers them to be loose.He often wears a gold bracelet on his right wrist. A notable feature is his accent which people usually find funny.
Weapon: None

065tdsa

SilentSilent arrived to the place where they had been hiding before. From there he could not see much in the camp, apparently everyone was asleep.

That included Anne, whom he saw near the front of the camp. Apparently she had fallen sleep waiting for them. He woke her up softly and quietly.

"Eh, Silent? Where are the others?" she asked, a bit confused. Silent showed her the bottle of pills he had taken from the pharmacy.

He took out one pill and placed it in her right hand, and then placed the bottle in her left. "Is this the right-" she started asking, but he saw someone coming from behind her, and ran off.

Silent doesn't really know you guys, so any of you could be the one appears now, and asks the questions.

hankolijo

Off: Sure, why not! Although that map for apocalypse was really just me drawing random lines, coloring randomly and adding names. But sure!

HankHank had to get some fresh air. He also hoped to see the scientists somewhere around. He had his plank with him.
He noticed a figure in the distance. A smaller one ran away from it.Hank proceeded with caution. He came closer, finding out it was a zombie.Hank swung the board, having the nail slash open a big hole in the zombies head.
It was a Cauc-Asian woman with big bongos. Hank turned around to see another zombie staring at him. A man, he seemed not to want to kill and/or horribly maul him.It felt weird. They just stood there staring at each other. Hank decided it was just another zed, so he tried pulling the nail out of the other creatures head. He just sorta flopped down, kinda like a video he saw on AFHV. The zombie seemed mildly amused, turned away and went in the woods. Embarrassed and trying to calm himself by thinking this zed won't be able to tell anyone of this possibly most embarrassing moment in the apocalyptic world. He managed to get the nail out and go back behind the gates.
On december 26, 2012
Draink
Draink

Draink rubbed the dry sleep from his eyes, staring back at the remnants of food and water. He felt forced to take the food, eat it all. He was hungry, hungry for nourishment. His tongue stuck to the roof of his mouth, every movement was agonizing.

He couldn't.

He rubbed both hands for warmth, looking at the sky directly above him. Swirls of dark clouds hung below the abundance of sparkly stars.

Draink got up, walking towards the food compartment. His hands grabbed onto it, the smell he took in was magnificent. The urge to jerk the top off and consume every grain of food and ounch of water compressed his thoughts.

He couldn't.

Something moved in the figures. He set the box back down in the shack and moved towards the figure.

It was Hank.

Hank
"Hey, what are you doing?"
Draink
"Gettin' some fresh air, you?"
Hank
"Same."
Draink
"Go 'round, help me wake up the others."

Day time! Approx. Day 41
Draink and Hank wake up the others for the mission.

How he got here: he was dispatched by the British army to help contain the infection.

Officer Morrison
Gender: Male
Age: Late 20s to Early 30s
Appearance: Patrol uniform, hat, blue eyes.
Weapon: .44 caliber magnum revolver.
Perks: Patrol car, experiences with pressured situations, calmed resolve.

On january 2, 2013
Draink

FALLEN TOWN

Malik
"We can bust open the police station."
Angela
She looked ahead, seeing heavily armored vehicles ahead, military sandbags alining the area. But then she saw the infected, always baby-sitting what would be treasure.
Merc
Merc nodded and went ahead. "When we had a full group, we never could get over here." He said in a whisper to Richard. "Hell, I'm scared."
Richard
Richard's eyes were motionless, his body tired and cold in the harsh winds. It felt below zero to him, his breaths coming out in whispy clouds. "We need to find some place to stay."
Malik
"That's our main priority," Malik nodded to Angela who then hit the remaining shards of glass in the window that could hurt them.
Angela
"I bet its looted," She said flatly.

Merc"Don't be such a downer." Merc jumped inside the old police station, bodies strewn on the blue tiles, officers and children laid dead. "God damn, its an effin' slaughterhouse."

Richard
Richard gulped, his eyes darted to a high pitched hissing. "O-over there!"
Angela
Angela raised the bat, tiptoeing at the side of a desk, her shoes stepping on old plastic covered files. She froze, seeing two children, a boy and a girl, along with an adult hunched over at the cold corpse of a police officer that was slumped halfway on his chair and his other side dangling off, his baton lay loose in his hands.

1-30 = Angela doesn't swing.
31-60 = Misses
61-100 = Angela swings the bat.
86
On january 2, 2013
065tdsa

65The smart one and his mates were leaving the school, as he wondered what to do next. Silent must be far already, he considered. That people, they might still be within reach... But why should we go after them?

Let's go look for something to eat instead, he concluded. "Look for food" he told the others as he smelled the air, trying to see if there was anything nearby.

He located a smell, like that of rotten flesh, but there was too much around and he couldn't pinpoint it. "Theereee" he heard someone saying beside him, and as he turned there was Pecked, who pointed towards what seemed to be a blockeade in the street.

He can't see, the smart one thought then as he observed him, but he is sure... It's worth checking.

Draink Draink woke up the last member, each of them taking a small sips from a plastic water bottle until it was dry. He unlocks the storage and grab onto the rim of the loaves of bread, slotting it into Jonas' backpack. "We'll need this."

AT THE FALLEN TOWN

On january 7, 2013
065tdsa

65The zombies finally got their well deserved feast after whole day attempting to do the right thing, eating some dead bodies over at the military blockeade.

As they arrived they saw that the place had been picked over almost completely, except for a few bodies that remained in a makeshift watchpost, outside of the other zombies' reach.

After a while of hitting it in the right spots with his machete, the smart one managed to take it down, and they had... dinner. Or more like a very early breakfast.

He setted a liver aside for Silent, whom would surely be hungry, and the group departed towards the beach.

Silent

Silent was hungry. He needed something to eat, and to that point he would have gladly gone after the ones in the beach camp, when he saw a deer that was eating some grass.

Apparently, as he was quietly hiding to avoid being spotted, the creature had not noticed him. He stood up slowly, and jumped at the creature before it could react.

He quickly grabbed it, and cutted it's neck with one of the blades he had on his arms. It wasn't so tasty, but it satiated his hunger.

Anne

Anne was a bit more calmed now that everyone was out of the camp. The few that were left wouldn't be any trouble as they were rather distracted with their own things.

She went inside the tent where Brandon was sleeping. As she saw him, she came into a realization. "He's gotta wake up to swallow the pill!" she said quietly.

She shook him a bit as she said "Wake up Brandon, come on!". He opened his eyes slowly and she told him "I have something that will make you better, swallow this" and placed the pill into his mouth.

He swallowed it and then fell asleep again. She left, trying to act normal but very worried and impacient to see if it worked or not.

Shortly there should be some meetings, since all of my chars are starting to gather, and their first "sort of epic quest" is reaching an end.

On january 8, 2013
hankolijo

Mark (silent boy)Scruffs liked the man. But he didn't care.
He lifted his head up to see a couple of people leave. 7 people.
It was quiet enough for him to go look around.
A little girl went in to a tent. Mark peeked in.
The girl woke up a man and made him swallow a pill. He then slid back to the tent he was at and sat down. He looked at scruffs, he was chewing on some roots. They were... edible!
He took a candy wrapper from the ground and a pencil from his bag. He wrote "eat me" and put it next to the root.
They might as well eat it.
He didn't care.
On january 9, 2013
[5804748]

Name: Jake
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes, short black hair, running shoes
Weapon: Machete
Perks: Fast
On january 9, 2013
[5804748]

Jake Slowly, one breath after the next, he looks over at the group of people. Could he trust them? He had to. Every bone, cell, and muscle held him back. They were screaming for him to stay back... His brain said yes. He slowly pushed himself forward after the people in the group. No...no...who are they? He kept moving, attempting to push every interrupting thought away. He slowly let out a breath and let his chest rise and fall. He hadn't known he'd been holding his breath. He reached down to his Machete. He let his hand grip it as firmly as they could. He crept toward them even closer. And without thinking he spat the word out. "Hi".

On january 10, 2013
[5804748]

JakeHe looked at the weary faces. All of them looked like they had been through much more than him. Though he felt dizzy, like all the hunger, thirst, and exhaustion had come at him in 1 big ball. All at once. He didn't want to eat or drink... not yet. He was sure some of these people had gone longer than him without eating. Mostly because they hadn't known about the civilization he had just come from. The one with warm water, electricity, and entertainment. He couldn't let them know about "that place". If he did then he would be endangering tons of people. He know that what was really important now was getting to know these people."Hey, I'm Jake... um... Hi?" It's been a long time since he's spoken to someone that hadn't been at the place before...normal people...just trying to survive. It felt like a dream...

On january 11, 2013
065tdsa

65The smart one, Gutless, Torso and Pecked were moving every bit more cautiously as they noticed they were approaching the area of the farms.

We could go around it... he thought, but instead decided to move through the area instead. They moved in slowly, they didn't want to bring attention to themselves.

Other zombies were around, walking without any purpose, and didn't notice them.

This few roamers don't seem to be any sort of trouble without someone to follow... the smart one thought. He decided to imitate them, to blend in.

So, all 3 of them pretended to be aimless, and drifted around every now and then, although they followed their path through the area.

They are relatively close to Val's place, but more close to Anne's farm house, and the other ones that were around. So yeah, close to the food (i mean your food, after all their food is... well, you know).

BlackVoid

HunterHunter stays ahead of the group, then waits at the tree line.

"Stay here and don't draw attention, I'll take care of em silently. Jump in if you see I'm in trouble."

Hunter moves silently away from the tree line, taking his time and making next to no noise. Slowly creeping up behind each zombie and sticking or slicing his sword through their head, he makes quick work of the few surrounding the farm. He's just taken out another one, when suddenly a zombie across the field turns to him. He stands stock still as the zombie's eyes pass straight by him, thanks to his midnight clothes. The zombie that almost caught him is moving closer to the tree line and Hunter can't move much or he'll alert it, which will in turn alert others. He signals the group at the tree line to kill it when it gets close enough.

Ummm... No one gonna eat dat root?
ScientistsApproaching the pharmaceutical lab, the group of scientists slowed down, otherwise they would be shot.
The front entrance was covered with boards and sandbags, men with all kinds of rifles stood in the windows.
They went to the back entrance in an alleyway, knocked on a thick metal door. A little window slid open and a pair of tired looking eyes stared at them for a good while.
" 'ome on in."
The door opened, a police man opening the door.
The building was filled with all kinds of projects: being the only place for science in town, it was the only refuge for the scientists living in town, driving by, or getting here in any other way.
Robots, chemicals, weapons, it all was invented here.

One of the scientists in the group went in an office.
A man sat in the shadows, windows boarded up, lights off.
Anyone who has seen his face was dead already.
"sir?"
"..."
"A group of survivors is camping out by the beach."
"..."
"sir?"
"take care of it the way you find fit."
"Yes sir. Thank you sir."

On january 15, 2013
065tdsa

65The smart one got a quick look of the figures that divided and moved in different directions. Although he could not distinguish them much, he knew that those were bad news.

He went down stairs quickly, and instructed the others to hide. Torso and Pecked went into a smaller room on the side, a bathroom it was. Gutless got sent into the kitchen area.

The smart one himself rearranged some furniture to cover him nicely. but he felt like the plan was incomplete, and had an idea.

He went over to the kitchen and went around opening the cabinets and grabbing stuff from inside. This reads "food", he thought, inspired by what seemed to be a rediscovery of the alphabet, this is what they eat!

He placed in in a table in the middle of the room where he was hiding, and got back to his position.

AnneAnne was getting concerned. As far she could see, the guys hadn't arrived. Silent had hunted a little for himself, but that was going to run out.

She had a feeling that kid, the one that wouldn't talk, had seen her, but that wasn't so important in perspective. He wasn't telling anyone about anything.

She decided to go see what was going on with Brandon. If there were no signs of improvement, she'd have to give him another pill. But she didn't know much about those things, and there was no way in hell to get Silent into the camp undetected.

As she went in, Brandon was sleeping, and looked exactly the same. But his fever seemed to have subsided slightly. Tomorrow i'll see what to do... Anne thought, and left the tent, acting naturally.

JonasAs Jonas waked up from his drunked faint he look around him... He was in a new area... He picked up his iron axe and slowly got up... On january 15, 2013
Draink
Draink

The world flashed and Draink fell onto his knees, cupping his ear. He swore and swore, feeling nothing where his ear was once. Through the corner of his eye, he saw the staggering undead snarling out of the treeline. He looked down, groaning as the burning sensation pulsed through his mind.

A stiff corpse lay, and the undead followed suit. They were farmers and agricultural workers with decomposed spores on their faces, each looking very similar.

Draink dropped the hatchet and screamed loudly into his elbow from the pain.
On january 15, 2013
hankolijo

HankBoards, pitchforks and hay. Good hideout- if your a hillbilly.
Hank noticed something big and red in the back.
He peeked around a batch of hay, only to see a big, juicy, shiny tomato.
"Sweet... i guess... just hope the others got something too."
Just as he was thinking that, a giant snake slid from behind the tomato.
"JESUS!" Exclaimed Hank, as he noticed a rotting corpse behind the tomato. It was full of the gooey creatures who had made it their home.The snake slid closer, hissing.
Hank swung his board, the nail crushing the creatures skull.
The other snakes began to hiss, some sliding over from behind the tomato that they had made their home as well, some going in the corpse.
Hank grabbed a pitchfork, bashing and stabbing any critter that got too close.
The corpse started convulsing.
While it as brain dead, some chemical in the snake poison activated the virus once again.
Snake kept looking down at the snakes. He had noticed it, but he didn't want to look at it. Snakes went through the eyes, mouth, stomach was full of those things.
The rest of the snakes on the ground retreated, sliding on the farmer, surrounding it with a wavy shield.
Hank threw pitchfork after pitchfork. He kept killing the snakes, but not the zombie.
Finally, the final pitchfork pierced the brain, making it dead. DEAD dead.
The rest of the snakes slid under the wall, towards the next door shed.
"That was... SAM!"
Hank turned around, but a zombie pounced on him.
"UGH! HEEELLLLPPPP!"
Hank shouted, pushing the zombie away from his neck, the creatures jaws spazzing out as it tries to bite his flesh.

Malik tensed up. He looked at the unwilling Merc but hyper Angela. Malik put his hand behind him, slipping out the police handgun. "Alright, let us in!"
Richard

Keith

Malik

Angela

Malik
Malik aimed the gun at the shack, going inside to find a girl and a sleeping youth. "Leave," He threatened and Anne retreated. "This is our land now.
Richard

Malik

The gunshot rang out and sent chills down Richard's spine. What had he done..., he thought.

Angela fell back into the campsite, locking the padlock gate. "Good luck living." She grinned.
Merc
Merc gulped. He looked at Brandon's motionless body in the blood-soaked cot and shivered. Beads of sweet slide down his throat.

On january 16, 2013
065tdsa

Anne"You motherfuckers, i enslaved myself to cure that guy! And i was actually succeding! Now you are going to see what's what!" Anne said, completely furious.

She felt like continuing to rant for a little while, but she knew that she had something more delicate to talk about with the guys.

So, she started going into the woods, as she told the other ones left outside "Follow me, there's someone you should meet now..."

"Now, there are a couple of things i have to tell you about" she continued as they followed her into the woods. "First, he's deft, so comunication can get tricky."

"Second, he is far smarter than he looks like. It's not like he told me, but i'd bet he was a doctor or something." Anne kept talking as she looked for him, but couldn't see him.

"And third... well, you wont believe it if i tell you. Just stay calm and don't do anything, at all. Because chances are you'll do it wrong, and some things can't be fixed."

SilentAs Silent could not hear the gunshot, he wasn't alerted about the situation in the least. He was very surprised when he saw Anne coming with other people behind her.

So he stayed hidden and waited to see what was going on. As he read Anne's lips, he thought that she must have been talking about him. She didn't seem to want to tell them much, she wanted them to see for themselves.

She didn't quite trust their reaction though, and neither did him, so he slipped out of his small hideout slowly, and watching them closely.

Anne"And... Well, this is Silent, and surely he'll give us a hand, wont you?" Anne said, and stood between him and the survivors, as she saw the zombie come out of hiding rather distrustful, and she noticed the blades had dry blood on them.
On january 16, 2013
hankolijo

Off:HELP HANK FOR PEACE SAKE!
MarkMark heard a gunshot, and he cautiously peeked out of his tent. The camps survivors were being left out by some unknown invaders.
He slowly walked over to the sick mans room. The bed was covered in blood, the body was gone.
Mark looked around the room.
Scruffs who had been sitting on his shoulder went over to the entrance and started to squeal. One of the intruders was coming!
Mark hid under a pile of clothes, hoping he doesn't see him.
It was a woman, holding one of the survivors machete.

Angela"I like this... wish i could have used it against those guys..."

MarkMark didn't care about the others. He didn't take a good look at the root. it was Cassava. The plant itself was gone, but the root remained...

Angela"Huh... Eat me..." She said as she nibbled a bit off the side.
She spit it out, realizing that is NOT edible.
She dropped the machete...

MarkMark grabbed the dropped weapon, swung back and...
Mark slid out of the room, scruffs on his back, the corpse under the pile of clothing.
He didn't care for others, but he did care for himself.

On january 23, 2013
Griffonn
GriffonnGriffonnWith his arms outstretched, griffon felt the palms of his hand slam against the metal grids of the catwalk, and intertwined his fingers into it. His body felt heavy, but he was just able to full himself up on the catwalk.

As he lay there, he did not look up, but heard the nine moaning walkers reaching for him, and then one by one, fall into the darkness of the pit, only to be followed seconds later by a large thud. And a minute later, the moaning stopped. Exhausted and out of breath, Griffonn lay there, and ahead of him past the catwalk, was the sewer grate. Where ever he was, he was safe, for now anyways.

GriffonCrawling out of the manhole, the natural light temporarily filled Griffon's eyes with a bright painful whiteness. As his eyes slowly and gradually adjusted to the daylight, he noticed a somewhat familiar scene set before him. He was not quite sure how long he had been underground for, and life was no where to be seen. The last thing he specifically remembered was cleaning up the dead bodies after the first battle on the beach.

Adjusting his torn tie, and straitening his wet and dirtied jacket, he was sure his butlering skills could help in little to none in this world, and nearly contemplated his life.

After moments of sitting and thinking in the middle of the road, a moan came from down the road a ways near a church. Slowly getting up, Griffon headed in the opposite direction, where he thought he remembered the beach was.

Draink

Draink took in the heat, and several pants of air. Dizzy, he scrambled for the hatchet, finding its handle. He grunted, waving the sharp ax at the first farmer. "Come on...," He spat. He had no sense what had happened before, but now as his heart beat shook him, he couldn't register reality.

"I said c'mon you stifling piece of horse shit!" Draink snapped the hatchet at the farmer, missing, the farmer feebly wrapping fingers around Draink. "Git off! Come'r!" He rose the hatchet, subsiding the stinging at the side of his head. He planted the ax in the farmer, then forcing the blade out.

He gasped for air, walking backwards. He scanned around for the other two, only to see Hunter and Jonas both gone. He raced out the highway and into the guest room. He grumbled and swore in pain. Looking through the room, he bolted to the door in a hurry. He secured the lock on the door handle. The repeated, suppressed thumping of the farmers ensued.

The room consisted of a yellowed, dusty mattress with a bedside lamp on top of a shelf. The small shelf had four drawers, an empty one hanging out with its joints pulled.

He walked over, jerking the other three out. Some beads, 6 loose screw(s), and the leftover of a pie, wrapped in greasy tinfoil, with 5 slices remaining. Better than nothin', he then fumbled through it and took the screw(s) and put the tinfoil pie in his pack.

He grabbed the wound and inspected it. Blood trickled down his fingers, causing him to swear again. He took the fabric from the mattress and pressed it against his head. The red splotches were everywhere.

Tying the sheet across his head for compression, he opened up the window and put his legs outside on the grassy yard.

Suddenly, its head popped off.

Blant"No prob bro. No prob..."
He looked back at Vel who had a bag of potatoes and a bag of carrots in the cart.

Draink

Off: Back after laptop battery died, I'll help by posting

Also, nice job 65 with Silent, but Anne swore like Hit-Girl from Kick Ass lol, isn't she like 10?

By the way, I have it how the beach camp group will meet with Adulfus' group, so don't kill them on first sight , or Malik's.

You know, she used those words her mother never knew she heard somewhere(i am betting she learned those at school).
And writing that down: "Do not kill them on first sight." Shouldn't be a problem... ¿Zombies can blink right?
Now, the people that were coming with her... If i have it right, they must have been Keith and Richard, so I'll be moving them around now.

AnneAnne found herself standing between Silent, who was ready to attack, and the startled Keith and Richard, the first holding back his dog, that was barking and showing it's teeth.

"Listen guys," she began, trying to keep it simple, "the thing is Silent, and some others... well, they helped me a lot. I don't really know how it works, but they are smart. One of them even talks... more or less."

"Look," she said, showing them the pills "Silent brought me these antibiotics, for Brandon. And they were working... But now we need to do something about this people."

Richard"This doesn't make any sense," Richard answered, "but he isn't trying to eat any of us... So you must know something. But no matter how strong he is, he can't be bullet proof. We should meet with the others."

KeithKeith finally was done calming his dog down and said "This doesn't make much sense, that i agree with. Are you saying they don't want to eat us?"

Anne"Well, some of them," Anne answered. "It started with your old friend, the military man, actually. But it seems that the whole bunch of them are getting smarter now. "

"Silent, as you might have noticed, has no ears," she continued, "and doesn't make any sounds, hence his name. But he can get his point across if he has to."

SilentSilent was thinking as Anne explained the situation. He looked at the lips of the people talking in front of him, and understood some of what they were saying.

Something about bullets. That made sense, as far as he could relate to the concept. He had seen some birds fly off just a minute ago.

They also talked about meeting with the others. That was interesting. He wasn't sure if they meant his other friends though. It had been a boring time, alone in the woods.
On january 25, 2013
Draink
Draink

Only 5 of the farmers were smart enough to follow him, but not smart enough to defeat Draink. Draink grinned, planting the hatchet into the shambler's skull and dodging the weak attempts of the others in the yard.

He moved to the next house. One plantation worker trudged alongside the red-brick house. He went up and shoved the workers to the ground, before entering the house.

The living room was a tomb of the dead farmers and several women, strewn across the furniture. He looked through the dim atmosphere, yanking some(8) loose boards from the floor for building.

The creatures had gathered on, banging on the front door, the wood cracking and splintering. Draink turned to the shelves and the wooden tables. They could be stripped of their wood, but he had no time.

Philip

The pickup truck sped down the avenue, passing a group of undead eating away at the corner store of the gasoline station, crouched over two corpses. Philip looked to see the cashier turn and hiss, shredded flesh hanging in its teeth.

Troy

Philip

On january 26, 2013
065tdsa

65The smart one could hear the battle raging outside, and some very loud screaming, that appeared that of some sort of wounded beast.

Knowing that something so noisy would bring lots of attention towards the area, he decided that they had to leave quickly. As he looked out through a window, however, something changed his mind.

Hunter... Again? he thought, as he spotted him, fighting through a crowd, cutting their heads off with his sword.

He called out to his mates, who had followed the instructions and just then got out of their hideouts.

He yelled "Move out!", and the small group left the house they had entered, and stood observing the fight that was going on there. The smart one signalled his own to remain there on the side, while he waited for a chance to act.

065tdsa

65The smart one listened, and considered things. 65? That's a number... Or is it my name? Or both? Yeah, that could be it.

In the meanwhile, Pecked, with Torso on his back, had taken a step towards Hunter, and 4 arms with rusty pieces of sharp metal were menacingly raised.

The smart one decided. He took a step forward and slashed with his machete, chopping through the head of a zombie that was approaching Hunter from the side.

"We will help" he said, and started moving towards a crowd that had been left unchecked, as he signalled the others to do the same. He turned around, and added "But not because of you..." talking slowly.

Then, they continued to stab effortlessly the dumb zombies that where around, as they paid little attention to them.

Draink

Draink pondered on the thought of how the truck came to their rescue. His vision blurred as he waved at the driver and turned around to keep a farmer at bay. He swung the ax, ripping through the plantation worker's throat and lodging the ax into decayed bone.

Draink

SamSam turned to see Hank-- with a walker on tugging at him. Sam instinctivly pulled the submachine gun out. "Stop moving!"

HankHank squirmed, grabbing onto the growling man and tossing him down. He looked to Sam.

SamSam did not need Hank to say anything. Without a second thought, he shot. The fizzling gun jerked back as a volley of bullets sped out to the yard; sending the townsman to crumple on the grass. Sam heard Draink calling, so with a pant he ushered Hank to follow hastily.

Coldflame

James RioganGuh...

James started to open his eyes. He wondered how long he'd been asleep. He was dreaming about himself as an action hero, stopping all this shit as an army commando. But he wasn't.

Around him was sand. He'd clearly ended up on a beach somewhere. He wasn't on his cruise anymore, that's for sure. The chunk of driftwood he'd clutched onto for dear life during the wreck was below him. He rose to his feet, and yelled out onto the beach.

James RioganHELLO? ANYONE HERE?!

Name: James Riogan

Gender: Male

Age: 27

Occupation: CEO of a solar-panel agency.

Clothes: Ruined buisiness suit, Glasses

Weapon: None

Perks: Smooth Talking, Smart.

On february 10, 2013
Snap

Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.
Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.



Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 (real name: unknown)
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).
Name : Chris
Gender : Male
Age : 20
Appearance : Scavenging backpack, tanktop, dirty pants, sandy shoes.
Weapons : Škorpion and Katana
Perks : Great at hand to hand combat and has knowledge on first aid.

Name: Hunter
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Appearance: Completely covered in midnight black clothes with lots of pockets and cloth with eye holes covered by goggles wrapped around his head. (can seem shady sometimes because of the outfit)
Weapon: Battery Launcher
Perks: Stealth, if you've got something you want done without much noise or unconcealed motion he's your man.

Name : Keith
Gender : Male
Age : 14
Appearance : Small, black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots
Weapons : A baton
Items : 2 cans of dog food
Perks : Good at close combat, has a tamed police dog

Name : Ruff
Gender : Male
Age : [Wtf??]
Appearance :Brown? Wears a police cap with a not-so-shiny crest.
Eats : Meat, Bones, Dog food
Perks : Able to understand his owner, Keith.

Moves : ((Basic moves such as eat not mentioned))
Leaping - Ruff leaps at a target's face. [LEAP]
Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

Name: Draink
Gender: Male
Age: 29
Appearance: Brown skin with a 5 o clock shadow, chipped shorts and oil-greased white T-shirt with dirt splatters.
Weapon: Rusty Chain
Perks: Hearing, observant, with a bucket full of architecture and digging (wells)

Name: Vel
Gender: Male
Age: 19
Appearance: Blond-haired, a somewhat athletic body, brown leather trousers with a ripped blue-shirt underneath.
Weapon: A pitchfork and a screwdriver
Perks: Quite a good farmer and has a formidable strength for his age.

Name: Travis
Gender: Male
Age: 32
Appearance: Burly man with sideburns, sports a Van Dyke style beard. He wears a dark green shirt and long, black pants that shake the hands of his sneakers. Black running shoes. African-American
Weapon: None.
Perks: Guardsman, ideal protection. Marksman with medium-range weapons.

Name: Brandon
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to early thirties
Appearance: Pale, brown shaggy hair that is overgrown. Multiple burn wounds across neck and chest, bandaged injury on knee. Gray shorts and flannel shirt. No shoes, blanket draped on. Caucasian.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Scavenging, useless now because of injuries from gas station explosions.

Name: Abraham Simmons
Gender: Male
Age: 27
Race: American-Indian
Appearance: A somewhat muscular man with clean cut hair, and a short-trimmed beard/mustache. He's wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with a medium-sized riot helmet on. He has dark blue boot-cut jeans and dark blue running sneakers.
Weapon: Steel Crowbar and a pocket knife.
Perks: Exceptional hearing, free runner, and a scavenger.

Name: Dick Chappy
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Wears a blood soaked gas mask and soldier dessert camouflage.(MMMM, dessert!)
Weapon: Desert eagle (8 bullets) and a hatchet
Perks: The Experience of being in isolated areas made him into a real survivalist.

Name: Sam
Gender: Male
Age: 20
Appearance: Slightly bulky athletic build, dirty blonde hair, a white T-shirt that is drenched and has sand all over it, and blue jeans.
Weapons: His wits. (besides his fists)
Perks: Has lots of heart, can stay calm in tense situations, very durable, able to withstand a lot of punishment because of years of being a pro Boxer. Good moral standing has incredible luck.

Name: Hank Creeper
Gender: Male
Age: 16
Appearance: Tight jeans and an over-sized white T-shirt. Gray eyes and short black hair.
Weapons: A plank with a nail in it.
Perks: He was an orphan with no friends. He doesn't get affected by depression, sadness, or any of that stuff. He was often beaten up on so he can take a few hits no problem. He also can give a few good punches. (extra melee and hand-to-hand)

Name: Jack
Gender: Male
Age: 18
Appearance: Wears a beret and a leather jacket.
Weapon: Serrated knife (????)
Perks: Spotting and stealth.
How he got here: he was dispatched by the British army to help contain the infection.

This is what i have so far, but this is just the whole post but copied. im sure there are many more characters.
On february 10, 2013
Snap

Name: Woody
Gender: Male
Age: 23
Appearance: Tattered clothes with lots of holes. Short hair, slippers.
Weapon: (Not so overpowering) A heavy silver axe
Perks: Craft wood.
Name: Griffonn
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Appearance: Has a light shade of stubble, with thick medium-length brown hair matted down by seawater. Tall and thin, he wears a soaking wet, ripped, white shirt with a crooked black tie. His black dress pants are ripped at one knee, and he is missing a shoe, exposing a loose black sock.
Weapon: A leather belt, and a formal walking stick.
Perks: With a high class social behavior, he has high speech skills.

Name: Bea (real name: Robin)
Gender: Female
Age: 12
Appearance: Small, dark-haired girl. Shy but quick and agile. Surprisingly strong for her size. Wears a faded blue dress. Has a cheap plastic beaded necklace. She has large blue eyes that take in everything. She rarely speaks. She is followed everywhere by a small, skinny cat.
Weapons: a water pistol (empty) and an exploding grapefruit, Revolver that uses 9mm bullets.
Perks: Though quiet, she sees everything. Bright and inquisitive.



Name : Alex (the police cadet)
Gender : Male
Age : 18
Appearance : Average size, Black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots.
Weapons : A baton, an empty revolver (6 bullets max) that uses 9MM rounds, 2 hand grenades
Perks : Good at close combat and accurate with pistols.

Name: Richard Keller
Gender: Male
Age: 35
Appearance: Wears a Uniform consisting of a blue shirt, white lab coat, red striped tie, white slacks and a pair of glasses.
Weapons: A rusty knife and a Glock 17 .
Perks: Richard is brisk and nervous; faced with the stress of fantastically improbable situations, he either devolve into hysterical panic and shock, or shield himself with hyperrational analysis. When you are injured, he will inject healing agents in you with a syringe.

Name: 65 (real name: unknown)
Gender: Male
Age: 40
Appearance: Wears an old military uniform, black, with the number 65 on the back. Has black hair, and black eyes, almost always staring either towards the most recent object of his attention or looking at the floor.
Weapons: He carries an old Machete around.
Perks: Toughness (not only about enduring damage, but also dealing with pain and negative effects).
Name : Chris
Gender : Male
Age : 20
Appearance : Scavenging backpack, tanktop, dirty pants, sandy shoes.
Weapons : Škorpion and Katana
Perks : Great at hand to hand combat and has knowledge on first aid.

Name: Hunter
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Appearance: Completely covered in midnight black clothes with lots of pockets and cloth with eye holes covered by goggles wrapped around his head. (can seem shady sometimes because of the outfit)
Weapon: Battery Launcher
Perks: Stealth, if you've got something you want done without much noise or unconcealed motion he's your man.

Name : Keith
Gender : Male
Age : 14
Appearance : Small, black hair. Donned in a neat, blue outfit and a beret. Has a belt and not-so-shiny boots
Weapons : A baton
Items : 2 cans of dog food
Perks : Good at close combat, has a tamed police dog

Name : Ruff
Gender : Male
Age : [Wtf??]
Appearance :Brown? Wears a police cap with a not-so-shiny crest.
Eats : Meat, Bones, Dog food
Perks : Able to understand his owner, Keith.

Moves : ((Basic moves such as eat not mentioned))
Leaping - Ruff leaps at a target's face. [LEAP]
Biting - Ruff bites on his target [OMNOM]
Clawing - Ruff claws his target. [Ching]
Detect - Ruff smells the air for the presence of zombies [Tect]

Name: Draink
Gender: Male
Age: 29
Appearance: Brown skin with a 5 o clock shadow, chipped shorts and oil-greased white T-shirt with dirt splatters.
Weapon: Rusty Chain
Perks: Hearing, observant, with a bucket full of architecture and digging (wells)

Name: Vel
Gender: Male
Age: 19
Appearance: Blond-haired, a somewhat athletic body, brown leather trousers with a ripped blue-shirt underneath.
Weapon: A pitchfork and a screwdriver
Perks: Quite a good farmer and has a formidable strength for his age.

Name: Travis
Gender: Male
Age: 32
Appearance: Burly man with sideburns, sports a Van Dyke style beard. He wears a dark green shirt and long, black pants that shake the hands of his sneakers. Black running shoes. African-American
Weapon: None.
Perks: Guardsman, ideal protection. Marksman with medium-range weapons.

Name: Brandon
Gender: Male
Age: Early twenties to early thirties
Appearance: Pale, brown shaggy hair that is overgrown. Multiple burn wounds across neck and chest, bandaged injury on knee. Gray shorts and flannel shirt. No shoes, blanket draped on. Caucasian.
Weapon: None.
Perks: Scavenging, useless now because of injuries from gas station explosions.

Name: Abraham Simmons
Gender: Male
Age: 27
Race: American-Indian
Appearance: A somewhat muscular man with clean cut hair, and a short-trimmed beard/mustache. He's wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with a medium-sized riot helmet on. He has dark blue boot-cut jeans and dark blue running sneakers.

On february 14, 2013
Coldflame

James wandered around a little, looking for...well, anything really. Eventually he saw a barn. Not special, really. What was special, was the group of dead trying to get inside.

JamesWhere there's smoke...

James tried to approach quietly without being seen. Unsurprisingly, there were three people fighting off the zed.

James...There's fire.

James tried to look around for something nearby that could help. Nothing, except the nearby decaying corpse of some poor bloke who'd seemingly given up from starvation or such. All the unlucky had on him was a lighter. James took it anyway, despite it being devoid of fuel. Providing the best help he could, James threw a rock at the zombies, attracting 7 to attack him instead.

Draink
Sam

Sam kept Jonas down, pushing him with his meaty foot, shooting down the incoming undead. He shot two down in a second, pressing his boot down into Jonas. The pain was unexpected, bursting through Sam's body. He looked down as Jonas' teeth went into his ankle. He groaned loudly, his shout shot down by the intense pitter-patter of the rain drops.

Sam removed himself from Jonas, trying to recollect himself as he backed away from him.

James cut the wound open some more mid-sentence, and pushed it in some more. He cut some material from Jonas' shirt, and dressed the wound.

JamesIt isn't great. But It'll do the job. I wouldn't mind a place to stay, either. You lost a fair bit of blood, but you'll live. Hopefully.

On march 6, 2013
Draink

AT THE CHURCH

Adulfus
Adulfus grunted, setting the wrapped up body by the tree. He rubbed his hands in the cool, cloudy morning. The leaves crackled by towards the north wind, heading to the ocean.
Tyrone
Tyrone looked down at Wesley's motionless body inside the stained cloth that was spun around him, like a mummy. He tried to swallow, but the guilt choked his words out. "This doesn't seem right..." Tyrone quivered as he saw Adulfus stiffen.

Adulfus"He lived and must now die by the way Christ did. Sacrifice."

TyroneTyrone should of expected that, the same old religious beliefs that Adulfus would say as an excuse for "I killed him". Tyrone remembered a month before, according to the calendar inside the church, the local street gang members that consisted of teenagers disappeared. "Hey.. Father?"

Adulfus
"Yes?"
Tyrone
"Speaking of sacrifice, He went eye-to-eye with Adulfus. "Was this a sacrifice just like the time those teens were taken by the cannibals?"
Adulfus
"Those hooligans knew they were going to be caught outside at night," His words flat and rough.
Tyrone
"Hooligans? They were middle schoolers who though it would be cool to spray graffiti!"

Adulfus"Oh alright, a misdemeanor."

Tyrone
"Do you think this is a joke? You murdered Wesly."
Adulfus
"Quiet, no one needs to know of this."
Tyrone
"And if I do? Should I start with the parents? The guards?"
Adulfus
Adulfus slid his hands into his pockets, seeking warmth from the chilly winds. "You know what happens to liars, right?" Adulfus loosened, smiled, and retreated back into the church.

Weather roll: 25
On march 6, 2013
Draink

Note: Weather is now cloudy, not much sunshine, and temperatures are dropping. Below average temperatures means we have to prepare for it by finding shelter, more food, and thicker clothing. According to the roll, the winter will be average length with average severity.

Pr. Lance"Noted Jackal, now move back, will ya?
He turned back to the people at the gates.

MalikThey eyed each other, outnumbered and outmatched, they were cornered, they knew the previous survivors, they wanted to know what happened to them.
"Well, we were looking for a place to say, then we found this camp. Gates wide open, zed laying everywhere. We went in and found all of the survivors dead. We cleaned the place up and decided to camp here."

Jackal BrownHe walked up to professor Lance again

Pr. Lance"Interesting... Now, what did you do to the bodies?
Malik"Burned the zed, sent the survivors bodies out in the ocean."
Pr. Lance"And their weapons?"
MalikThe others started to feel uncomfortable, but Malik started to enjoy his lie.
"Sent them down with 'em."
Pr. LanceStrike 3, you're out.
He was about to call out their lie, but suddenly...
Blant"Hey, whats going on here?
As soon as PR. Lance faced him, his face had a look of deep surprise, but it was soon replaced by an evil smirk.
Pr. Lance"Can my men rest in your camp while I explain things to this gentleman?
MalikMalik didn't want to, but he had to keep up the act, so he nodded.
Pr. Lance"Excellent!"

Blant"Fuck you."
Pr. Lance"Is that any way to speak to your older brother Benson? Your disgracing the Lance family name!"
Blant"No."
Pr. Lance"So your finally agree with me?"

Blant (Benson)"Just fine."
Pr. Lance"Why don't you guys go in camp, while the we finsih our chat here?"





Pr. Lance"Blant? Is that what you call yourself now? Well then Blant, listen to this- i am going to go in there and do something. If you try and stop me, I am going to tell all your friends about your former deeds."

They walked in to camp. A cold breeze flew across. It was dead silent.
Hank had found Mark, hiding in the trash. Malik was trying to find an explanation for all of it. He was tangled in his own lies.
Professor Lance walked up to them. He looked at both of them.
Suddenly, he pulled out a gun from a nearby soldiers pocket and shot Malik in his right arm. He quickly grabbed hank and shoved him in some troops hands.
Take the other ones who worked with this cretin and take them in custody . This other guy will come with us to tell everything he knows about this camp. The rest of you stay back or..."
Suddenly, a man with a gas mask and huge fuel tanks on his back came thru the gates.
"We burn this place to the ground."
BlantBlant looked almost blindly, as they walked away with one of his rare friends, but he was unable to do anything about it.

DrainkDraink felt his face weltering in the sun, though the frosty weather coated him. To his right, he saw the shambling figures of undead. Shit...

They fell out of the shadows and onto his plate, his hatchet planting itself into the red face of a man. He pulled the bit of the hatchet out with both hands, watching the rotter fall onto the dead leaves and dirt.

Draink puffed, his throat hoarse and cracky. "Come on, come on!" The hatchet went through the air, connecting with the nearest rotter. As he yanked the ax out from its shoulder, four came on his victim's sides.

He took backwards steps, exhausted and a mess. Their dry moans came closer.

Radio.

Draink took the radio off its clip and put it unsteadily in front of his face. There was no other choice.

The radio crackled to life.

The military set up a sniping position on the opposite building.
But those guys outgunned the US government...
So, if we take them by surprise, you could use the next door building to get in to the alleyway. They have an entrance there. The front will get you guys killed.
I could go up on the sniping location. I have some experience with those things."

Off: Edited the Island map, added some descriptions to the locations. Not sure if its good enough, but eh. Use it when going to a location.

DrainkDraink moved the weaponry to the storage, taking a peek at one of the handguns. He wasn't particularly skilled with guns, or any firearm for that matter. He tried unloading the magazine, and finally it came out. He counted about a dozen, and that would be a dozen rotters sent to their graves.

Draink gulped, remembering the crack of the ax and landing a blow on the man's head. He grimaced, taking the handgun and adjusting the hatchet tied to his belt.

"There's this rest stop not a mile from here, a diner and motel too. The rest stop could have some coats and coal for fires." Draink held his head down and started walking out of camp, catching Richard's eye.

Draink pursed his lips in revelation, too stubborn to believe the truth. He trudged on out, heading for the trees.

Then, the gates shut him out with a clattering noise. He was off to his destination, his underlying guilt feasting on his insides.
